  49  {

  54      var $pass;
  55      var $firstname;

  58      var $locale;
  59      var $email;
  60      var $url;

  85      /**

  95       * @access protected

 154      /**
 155       * Constructor
 156       *
 157       * @param object DB row
 158       */
 159  	function User( $db_row = NULL )
 160      {
 161          global $default_locale, $Settings, $localtimenow;
 162  
 163          // Call parent constructor:
 164          parent::DataObject( 'T_users', 'user_', 'user_ID' );
 165  
 166          // blueyed> TODO: this will never get translated for the current User if he has another locale/lang set than default, because it gets adjusted AFTER instantiating him/her..
 167          //       Use a callback (get_delete_restrictions/get_delete_cascades) instead? Should be also better for performance!
 168          // fp> These settings should probably be merged with the global database description used by the installer/upgrader. However I'm not sure about how compelx plugins would be able to integrate then...
 169          $this->delete_restrictions = array(
 170                  array( 'table'=>'T_blogs', 'fk'=>'blog_owner_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d blogs owned by this user') ),
 171                  //array( 'table'=>'T_items__item', 'fk'=>'post_lastedit_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d posts last edited by this user') ),
 172                  array( 'table'=>'T_items__item', 'fk'=>'post_assigned_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d posts assigned to this user') ),
 173                  // Do not delete user private messages
 174                  //array( 'table'=>'T_messaging__message', 'fk'=>'msg_author_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('The user has authored %d message(s)') ),
 175                  //array( 'table'=>'T_messaging__threadstatus', 'fk'=>'tsta_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('The user is part of %d messaging thread(s)') ),
 176              );
 177  
 178          $this->delete_cascades = array(
 179                  array( 'table'=>'T_users__usersettings', 'fk'=>'uset_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d user settings on collections') ),
 180                  array( 'table'=>'T_sessions', 'fk'=>'sess_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d sessions opened by this user') ),
 181                  array( 'table'=>'T_coll_user_perms', 'fk'=>'bloguser_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d user permissions on blogs') ),
 182                  array( 'table'=>'T_comments__votes', 'fk'=>'cmvt_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d user votes on comments') ),
 183                  array( 'table'=>'T_subscriptions', 'fk'=>'sub_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d blog subscriptions') ),
 184                  array( 'table'=>'T_items__item', 'fk'=>'post_creator_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d posts created by this user') ),
 185                  array( 'table'=>'T_items__subscriptions', 'fk'=>'isub_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d post subscriptions') ),
 186                  array( 'table'=>'T_messaging__contact', 'fk'=>'mct_to_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d contacts from other users contact list') ),
 187                  array( 'table'=>'T_messaging__contact', 'fk'=>'mct_from_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d contacts from this user contact list') ),
 188                  array( 'table'=>'T_messaging__contact_groups', 'fk'=>'cgr_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d contact groups') ),
 189                  array( 'table'=>'T_messaging__contact_groupusers', 'fk'=>'cgu_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d contacts from contact groups') ),
 190                  array( 'table'=>'T_pluginusersettings', 'fk'=>'puset_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d user settings on plugins') ),
 191                  array( 'table'=>'T_users__fields', 'fk'=>'uf_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d user fields') ),
 192                  array( 'table'=>'T_links', 'fk'=>'link_usr_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d links to this user') ),
 193                  array( 'table'=>'T_links', 'fk'=>'link_creator_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d links created by this user') ),
 194                  array( 'table'=>'T_files', 'fk'=>'file_root_ID', 'and_condition' => 'file_root_type = "user"', 'msg'=>T_('%d files from this user file root') ),
 195                  array( 'table'=>'T_email__campaign_send', 'fk'=>'csnd_user_ID', 'msg'=>T_('%d newsletter emails for this user') ),
 196              );
 197  
 198          if( $db_row == NULL )
 199          { // Setting those object properties, which are not "NULL" in DB (MySQL strict mode):
 200  
 201              // echo 'Creating blank user';
 202              $this->set( 'login', 'login' );
 203              $this->set( 'pass', md5('pass') );
 204              $this->set( 'locale',
 205                  isset( $Settings )
 206                      ? $Settings->get('default_locale') // TODO: (settings) use "new users template setting"
 207                      : $default_locale );
 208              $this->set( 'email', '' );    // fp> TODO: this is an invalid value. Saving the object without a valid email should fail! (actually: it should be fixed by providing a valid email)
 209              $this->set( 'level', isset( $Settings ) ? $Settings->get('newusers_level') : 0 );
 210              if( isset($localtimenow) )
 211              {
 212                  $this->set_datecreated( $localtimenow );
 213                  $this->set( 'profileupdate_date', date( 'Y-m-d', $localtimenow ) );
 214              }
 215              else
 216              { // We don't know local time here!
 217                  $this->set_datecreated( time() );
 218                  $this->set( 'profileupdate_date', date( 'Y-m-d', time() ) );
 219              }
 220  
 221              if( isset( $Settings ) )
 222              { // Set Group for this user:
 223                  $GroupCache = & get_GroupCache();
 224                  $new_user_Group = & $GroupCache->get_by_ID( $Settings->get( 'newusers_grp_ID' ) );
 225                  $this->set_Group( $new_user_Group );
 226                  // set status for this user
 227                  $this->set( 'status', $Settings->get('newusers_mustvalidate') ? 'new' : 'autoactivated' );
 228              }
 229              else
 230              {
 231                  // set status for this user
 232                  $this->set( 'status', 'new' );
 233              }
 234  
 235              $this->set( 'unsubscribe_key', generate_random_key() );
 236          }
 237          else
 238          {
 239              // echo 'Instanciating existing user';
 240              $this->ID = $db_row->user_ID;
 241              $this->age_min = $db_row->user_age_min;
 242              $this->age_max = $db_row->user_age_max;
 243              $this->login = $db_row->user_login;
 244              $this->pass = $db_row->user_pass;
 245              $this->firstname = $db_row->user_firstname;
 246              $this->lastname = $db_row->user_lastname;
 247              $this->nickname = $db_row->user_nickname;
 248              $this->locale = $db_row->user_locale;
 249              $this->email = $db_row->user_email;
 250              $this->status = $db_row->user_status;
 251              $this->url = $db_row->user_url;
 252              $this->datecreated = $db_row->user_created_datetime;
 253              $this->lastseen_ts = $db_row->user_lastseen_ts;
 254              $this->level = $db_row->user_level;
 255              $this->unsubscribe_key = $db_row->user_unsubscribe_key;
 256              $this->gender = $db_row->user_gender;
 257              $this->avatar_file_ID = $db_row->user_avatar_file_ID;
 258              $this->reg_ctry_ID = $db_row->user_reg_ctry_ID;
 259              $this->ctry_ID = $db_row->user_ctry_ID;
 260              $this->rgn_ID = $db_row->user_rgn_ID;
 261              $this->subrg_ID = $db_row->user_subrg_ID;
 262              $this->city_ID = $db_row->user_city_ID;
 263              $this->source = $db_row->user_source;
 264              $this->profileupdate_date = $db_row->user_profileupdate_date;
 265  
 266              // Group for this user:
 267              $this->grp_ID = $db_row->user_grp_ID;
 268          }
 269      }

 272      /**
 273       * Load data from Request form fields.
 274       *
 275       * @return boolean true if loaded data seems valid.
 276       */
 277  	function load_from_Request()
 278      {
 279          global $DB, $Settings, $UserSettings, $GroupCache, $Messages, $action;
 280          global $current_User, $Session, $localtimenow;
 281  
 282          $is_new_user = ( $this->ID == 0 );
 283  
 284          // ---- Login checking / START ----
 285          $edited_user_login = param( 'edited_user_login', 'string' );
 286          if( empty( $edited_user_login ) )
 287          {    // Empty login
 288              param_error( 'edited_user_login', T_('Please enter your login.') );
 289          }
 290          param_check_valid_login( 'edited_user_login' );
 291  
 292          $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
 293          $UserLogin = $UserCache->get_by_login( $edited_user_login );
 294          if( $UserLogin && $UserLogin->ID != $this->ID )
 295          {    // The login is already registered
 296              $login_error_message = T_( 'This login already exists.' );
 297              if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
 298              {
 299                  $login_error_message = sprintf( T_( 'This login &laquo;%s&raquo; already exists. Do you want to <a %s>edit the existing user</a>?' ),
 300                      $edited_user_login,
 301                      'href="'.get_user_settings_url( 'profile', $UserLogin->ID ).'"' );
 302              }
 303              param_error( 'edited_user_login', $login_error_message );
 304          }
 305  
 306          if( !param_has_error( 'edited_user_login' ) )
 307          {    // We want all logins to be lowercase to guarantee uniqueness regardless of the database case handling for UNIQUE indexes:
 308              $this->set_from_Request( 'login', 'edited_user_login', true, 'evo_strtolower' );
 309          }
 310          // ---- Login checking / END ----
 311  
 312          $is_identity_form = param( 'identity_form', 'boolean', false );
 313          $is_admin_form = param( 'admin_form', 'boolean', false );
 314          $has_full_access = $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' );
 315  
 316          // ******* Admin form or new user create ******* //
 317          // In both cases current user must have users edit permission!
 318          if( ( $is_admin_form || ( $is_identity_form && $is_new_user ) ) && $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit', true ) )
 319          { // level/group and email options are displayed on identity form only when creating a new user.
 320              if( $this->ID != 1 )
 321              { // the admin user group can't be changed
 322                  param_integer_range( 'edited_user_level', 0, 10, T_('User level must be between %d and %d.') );
 323                  $this->set_from_Request( 'level', 'edited_user_level', true );
 324  
 325                  $edited_user_Group = $GroupCache->get_by_ID( param( 'edited_user_grp_ID', 'integer' ) );
 326                  $this->set_Group( $edited_user_Group );
 327              }
 328  
 329              param( 'edited_user_source', 'string', true );
 330              $this->set_from_Request('source', 'edited_user_source', true);
 331  
 332              // set email, without changing the user status
 333              $edited_user_email = evo_strtolower( param( 'edited_user_email', 'string', true ) );
 334              param_check_not_empty( 'edited_user_email', T_('Please enter your e-mail address.') );
 335              param_check_email( 'edited_user_email', true );
 336              $this->set_email( $edited_user_email, false );
 337  
 338              if( $is_admin_form )
 339              {    // Admin form
 340                  $notification_sender_email = evo_strtolower( param( 'notification_sender_email', 'string', true ) );
 341                  param_check_email( 'notification_sender_email' );
 342                  if( ! empty( $notification_sender_email ) )
 343                  { // Change a value of setting
 344                      $UserSettings->set( 'notification_sender_email', $notification_sender_email, $this->ID );
 345                  }
 346                  elseif( $UserSettings->get( 'notification_sender_email' , $this->ID ) != '' )
 347                  { // Delete a setting record from DB
 348                      $UserSettings->delete( 'notification_sender_email', $this->ID );
 349                  }
 350  
 351                  $notification_sender_name = param( 'notification_sender_name', 'string', true );
 352                  if( ! empty( $notification_sender_name ) )
 353                  { // Change a value of setting
 354                      $UserSettings->set( 'notification_sender_name', $notification_sender_name, $this->ID );
 355                  }
 356                  elseif( $UserSettings->get( 'notification_sender_name' , $this->ID ) != '' )
 357                  { // Delete a setting record from DB
 358                      $UserSettings->delete( 'notification_sender_name', $this->ID );
 359                  }
 360  
 361                  if( !isset( $this->dbchanges['user_email'] ) )
 362                  {    // If email address is not changed
 363                      // Update status of email address in the T_email_address table
 364                      $edited_email_status = param( 'edited_email_status', 'string' );
 365                      $EmailAddressCache = & get_EmailAddressCache();
 366                      $EmailAddress = & $EmailAddressCache->get_by_name( $this->get( 'email' ), false, false );
 367                      if( !$EmailAddress && $edited_email_status != 'unknown' )
 368                      {    // Create new record in the T_email_address table
 369                          $EmailAddress = new EmailAddress();
 370                          $EmailAddress->set( 'address', $this->get( 'email' ) );
 371                      }
 372                      if( !empty( $EmailAddress ) )
 373                      {    // Save status of an email address
 374                          $EmailAddress->set( 'status', $edited_email_status );
 375                          $EmailAddress->dbsave();
 376                      }
 377                  }
 378  
 379                  if( $current_User->check_perm( 'spamblacklist', 'edit' ) )
 380                  { // User can edit IP ranges
 381                      // Update status of IP range in DB
 382                      $edited_iprange_status = param( 'edited_iprange_status', 'string' );
 383                      $IPRangeCache = & get_IPRangeCache();
 384                      $IPRange = & $IPRangeCache->get_by_ip( int2ip( $UserSettings->get( 'created_fromIPv4', $this->ID ) ) );
 385                      if( !$IPRange && !empty( $edited_iprange_status ) )
 386                      { // IP range doesn't exist in DB, Create new record
 387                          $ip_24bit_start = ip2int( preg_replace( '#\.\d{1,3}$#i', '.0', int2ip( $UserSettings->get( 'created_fromIPv4', $this->ID ) ) ) );
 388                          $ip_24bit_end = ip2int( preg_replace( '#\.\d{1,3}$#i', '.255', int2ip( $UserSettings->get( 'created_fromIPv4', $this->ID ) ) ) );
 389                          $IPRange = new IPRange();
 390                          $IPRange->set( 'IPv4start', $ip_24bit_start );
 391                          $IPRange->set( 'IPv4end', $ip_24bit_end );
 392                          $IPRange->set( 'user_count', 1 );
 393                      }
 394                      if( $IPRange )
 395                      { // Save status of IP range
 396                          if( $IPRange->get( 'status' ) != 'blocked' && $edited_iprange_status == 'blocked' )
 397                          {    // Status was changed to blocked, we should increase counter
 398                              $IPRange->set( 'block_count', $IPRange->block_count + 1 );
 399                          }
 400                          else if( $IPRange->get( 'status' ) == 'blocked' && $edited_iprange_status != 'blocked' )
 401                          { // Status was changed from blocked to another, we should decrease counter
 402                              $IPRange->set( 'block_count', $IPRange->block_count - 1 );
 403                          }
 404                          $IPRange->set( 'status', $edited_iprange_status, true );
 405                          $IPRange->dbsave();
 406                      }
 407                  }
 408  
 409                  if( $current_User->check_perm( 'stats', 'edit' ) )
 410                  { // User can edit Domains
 411                      $DomainCache = & get_DomainCache();
 412  
 413                      // Update status of Domain in DB
 414                      $edited_domain_status = param( 'edited_domain_status', 'string' );
 415                      $user_domain = $UserSettings->get( 'user_domain', $this->ID );
 416                      $Domain = & $DomainCache->get_by_name( $user_domain, false, false );
 417                      if( ! $Domain && $edited_domain_status != 'unknown' && ! empty( $user_domain ) )
 418                      { // Domain doesn't exist in DB, Create new record
 419                          $Domain = new Domain();
 420                          $Domain->set( 'name', $user_domain );
 421                      }
 422                      if( $Domain )
 423                      { // Save status of Domain
 424                          $Domain->set( 'status', $edited_domain_status, true );
 425                          $Domain->dbsave();
 426                      }
 427  
 428                      // Update status of Initial referer in DB
 429                      load_funcs('sessions/model/_hitlog.funcs.php');
 430                      $edited_initial_referer_status = param( 'edited_initial_referer_status', 'string' );
 431                      $initial_referer = $UserSettings->get( 'initial_referer', $this->ID );
 432                      $initial_referer_domain = url_part( $initial_referer, 'host' );
 433                      $Domain = & get_Domain_by_url( $initial_referer );
 434                      if( ! $Domain && $edited_initial_referer_status != 'unknown' && ! empty( $initial_referer_domain ) )
 435                      { // Domain doesn't exist in DB, Create new record
 436                          $Domain = new Domain();
 437                          $Domain->set( 'name', $initial_referer_domain );
 438                      }
 439                      if( $Domain )
 440                      { // Save status of Domain
 441                          $Domain->set( 'status', $edited_initial_referer_status, true );
 442                          $Domain->dbsave();
 443                      }
 444                  }
 445              }
 446          }
 447  
 448          // ******* Identity form ******* //
 449          if( $is_identity_form )
 450          {
 451              $can_edit_users = $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' );
 452              $edited_user_perms = array( 'edited-user', 'edited-user-required' );
 453  
 454              global $edited_user_age_min, $edited_user_age_max;
 455              param( 'edited_user_age_min', 'string', true );
 456              param( 'edited_user_age_max', 'string', true );
 457              param_check_interval( 'edited_user_age_min', 'edited_user_age_max', T_('Age must be a number.'), T_('The first age must be lower than (or equal to) the second.') );
 458              if( !param_has_error( 'edited_user_age_min' ) && $Settings->get( 'minimum_age' ) > 0 &&
 459                  !empty( $edited_user_age_min ) && $edited_user_age_min < $Settings->get( 'minimum_age' ) )
 460              {    // Limit user by minimum age
 461                  param_error( 'edited_user_age_min', sprintf( T_('You must be at least %d years old to use this service.'), $Settings->get( 'minimum_age' ) ) );
 462              }
 463              $this->set_from_Request( 'age_min', 'edited_user_age_min', true );
 464              $this->set_from_Request( 'age_max', 'edited_user_age_max', true );
 465  
 466              $firstname_editing = $Settings->get( 'firstname_editing' );
 467              if( ( in_array( $firstname_editing, $edited_user_perms ) && $this->ID == $current_User->ID ) || ( $firstname_editing != 'hidden' && $can_edit_users ) )
 468              {    // User has a permissions to save Firstname
 469                  param( 'edited_user_firstname', 'string', true );
 470                  if( $firstname_editing == 'edited-user-required' )
 471                  {    // First name is required
 472                      if( $can_edit_users )
 473                      {    // Display a note message if user can edit all users
 474                          param_add_message_to_Log( 'edited_user_firstname', T_('Please enter your first name.'), 'note' );
 475                      }
 476                      else
 477                      {    // Display an error message
 478                          param_check_not_empty( 'edited_user_firstname', T_('Please enter your first name.') );
 479                      }
 480                  }
 481                  $this->set_from_Request('firstname', 'edited_user_firstname', true);
 482              }
 483  
 484              $lastname_editing = $Settings->get( 'lastname_editing' );
 485              if( ( in_array( $lastname_editing, $edited_user_perms ) && $this->ID == $current_User->ID ) || ( $lastname_editing != 'hidden' && $can_edit_users ) )
 486              {    // User has a permissions to save Lastname
 487                  param( 'edited_user_lastname', 'string', true );
 488                  if( $lastname_editing == 'edited-user-required' )
 489                  {    // Last name is required
 490                      if( $can_edit_users )
 491                      {    // Display a note message if user can edit all users
 492                          param_add_message_to_Log( 'edited_user_lastname', T_('Please enter last name.'), 'note' );
 493                      }
 494                      else
 495                      {    // Display an error message
 496                          param_check_not_empty( 'edited_user_lastname', T_('Please enter last name.') );
 497                      }
 498                  }
 499                  $this->set_from_Request('lastname', 'edited_user_lastname', true);
 500              }
 501  
 502              $nickname_editing = $Settings->get( 'nickname_editing' );
 503              if( ( in_array( $nickname_editing, $edited_user_perms ) && $this->ID == $current_User->ID ) || ( $nickname_editing != 'hidden' && $can_edit_users ) )
 504              {    // User has a permissions to save Nickname
 505                  param( 'edited_user_nickname', 'string', true );
 506                  if( $nickname_editing == 'edited-user-required' )
 507                  {    // Nickname is required
 508                      if( $can_edit_users )
 509                      {    // Display a note message if user can edit all users
 510                          param_add_message_to_Log( 'edited_user_nickname', T_('Please enter your nickname.'), 'note' );
 511                      }
 512                      else
 513                      {    // Display an error message
 514                          param_check_not_empty( 'edited_user_nickname', T_('Please enter your nickname.') );
 515                      }
 516                  }
 517                  $this->set_from_Request('nickname', 'edited_user_nickname', true);
 518              }
 519  
 520              param( 'edited_user_gender', 'string', '' );
 521              if( param_check_gender( 'edited_user_gender', $Settings->get( 'registration_require_gender' ) == 'required' ) )
 522              {
 523                  $this->set_from_Request('gender', 'edited_user_gender', true);
 524              }
 525  
 526              // ---- Locations / START ----
 527              load_funcs( 'regional/model/_regional.funcs.php' );
 528  
 529              if( user_country_visible() )
 530              {    // Save country
 531                  $country_ID = param( 'edited_user_ctry_ID', 'integer', true );
 532                  $country_is_required = ( $Settings->get( 'location_country' ) == 'required' && countries_exist() );
 533                  if( $country_is_required && $can_edit_users && $country_ID == 0 )
 534                  {    // Display a note message if user can edit all users
 535                      param_add_message_to_Log( 'edited_user_ctry_ID', T_('Please select a country.'), 'note' );
 536                  }
 537                  else
 538                  {    // Display an error message
 539                      param_check_number( 'edited_user_ctry_ID', T_('Please select a country.'), $country_is_required );
 540                  }
 541                  $this->set_from_Request('ctry_ID', 'edited_user_ctry_ID', true);
 542              }
 543  
 544              if( user_region_visible() && isset( $country_ID ) && $country_ID > 0 )
 545              {    // Save region
 546                  $region_ID = param( 'edited_user_rgn_ID', 'integer', true );
 547                  $region_is_required = ( $Settings->get( 'location_region' ) == 'required' && regions_exist( $country_ID ) );
 548                  if( $region_is_required && $can_edit_users && $region_ID == 0 )
 549                  {    // Display a note message if user can edit all users
 550                      param_add_message_to_Log( 'edited_user_rgn_ID', T_('Please select a region.'), 'note' );
 551                  }
 552                  else
 553                  {    // Display an error message
 554                      param_check_number( 'edited_user_rgn_ID', T_('Please select a region'), $region_is_required );
 555                  }
 556                  $this->set_from_Request('rgn_ID', 'edited_user_rgn_ID', true);
 557              }
 558  
 559              if( user_subregion_visible() && isset( $region_ID ) && $region_ID > 0 )
 560              {    // Save subregion
 561                  $subregion_ID = param( 'edited_user_subrg_ID', 'integer', true );
 562                  $subregion_is_required = ( $Settings->get( 'location_subregion' ) == 'required' && subregions_exist( $region_ID ) );
 563                  if( $subregion_is_required && $can_edit_users && $subregion_ID == 0 )
 564                  {    // Display a note message if user can edit all users
 565                      param_add_message_to_Log( 'edited_user_subrg_ID', T_('Please select a sub-region.'), 'note' );
 566                  }
 567                  else
 568                  {    // Display an error message
 569                      param_check_number( 'edited_user_subrg_ID', T_('Please select a sub-region.'), $subregion_is_required );
 570                  }
 571                  $this->set_from_Request('subrg_ID', 'edited_user_subrg_ID', true);
 572              }
 573  
 574              if( user_city_visible() && isset( $region_ID ) && $region_ID > 0 )
 575              {    // Save city
 576                  $city_ID = param( 'edited_user_city_ID', 'integer', true );
 577                  $city_is_required = ( $Settings->get( 'location_city' ) == 'required' && cities_exist( $country_ID, $region_ID, $subregion_ID ) );
 578                  if( $city_is_required && $can_edit_users && $city_ID == 0 )
 579                  {    // Display a note message if user can edit all users
 580                      param_add_message_to_Log( 'edited_user_city_ID', T_('Please select a city.'), 'note' );
 581                  }
 582                  else
 583                  {    // Display an error message
 584                      param_check_number( 'edited_user_city_ID', T_('Please select a city.'), $city_is_required );
 585                  }
 586                  $this->set_from_Request('city_ID', 'edited_user_city_ID', true);
 587              }
 588              // ---- Locations / END ----
 589  
 590  
 591              // ---- Additional Fields / START ----
 592  
 593              // Load all defined userfields for following checking of required fields
 594              $this->userfield_defs_load();
 595  
 596              // EXPERIMENTAL user fields & EXISTING fields:
 597              // Get indices of existing userfields:
 598              $userfield_IDs = $DB->get_results( '
 599                          SELECT uf_ID, uf_ufdf_ID
 600                              FROM T_users__fields
 601                           WHERE uf_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
 602  
 603              foreach( $userfield_IDs as $userfield )
 604              {
 605                  $field_type = ( $this->userfield_defs[$userfield->uf_ufdf_ID][0] == 'text' ) ? 'text' : 'string';
 606                  $uf_val = param( 'uf_'.$userfield->uf_ID, $field_type, '' );
 607  
 608                  if( $this->userfield_defs[$userfield->uf_ufdf_ID][0] == 'list' && $uf_val == '---' )
 609                  {    // Option list has a value '---' for empty value
 610                      $uf_val = '';
 611                  }
 612  
 613                  $uf_val = trim( strip_tags( $uf_val ) );
 614                  if( empty( $uf_val ) && $this->userfield_defs[$userfield->uf_ufdf_ID][2] == 'require' )
 615                  {    // Display error for empty required field
 616                      if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
 617                      {    // Display a note message if user can edit all users
 618                          param_add_message_to_Log( 'uf_'.$userfield->uf_ID, sprintf( T_('Please enter a value for the field "%s".'), $this->userfield_defs[$userfield->uf_ufdf_ID][1] ), 'note' );
 619                      }
 620                      else
 621                      {    // Display an error message
 622                          param_error( 'uf_'.$userfield->uf_ID, T_('Please enter a value.') );
 623                      }
 624                  }
 625                  else
 626                  {    // Update field
 627                      if( $this->userfield_defs[$userfield->uf_ufdf_ID][0] == 'url' )
 628                      {    // Check url fields
 629                          param_check_url( 'uf_'.$userfield->uf_ID, 'commenting' );
 630                      }
 631                      if( $this->userfield_defs[$userfield->uf_ufdf_ID][4] == 'list' )
 632                      {    // Option "Multiple values" == "List style"
 633                          // Split by comma and save each phrase as separate field
 634                          $uf_val = explode( ',', $uf_val );
 635                          foreach( $uf_val as $v => $val )
 636                          {
 637                              $val = trim( $val );
 638                              if( $v == 0 )
 639                              {    // Update field with first value
 640                                  $this->userfield_update( $userfield->uf_ID, $val );
 641                              }
 642                              else if( !empty( $val ) )
 643                              {    // Add a new field for new values
 644                                  $this->userfield_add( $userfield->uf_ufdf_ID, $val );
 645                              }
 646                          }
 647                      }
 648                      else
 649                      {    // Forbidden & Allowed fields
 650                          $this->userfield_update( $userfield->uf_ID, $uf_val );
 651                      }
 652                  }
 653              }
 654  
 655              // Duplicate fields:
 656              if( $is_new_user )
 657              {
 658                  $user_id = param( 'orig_user_ID', 'integer', 0 );
 659                  if( $user_id !== 0 )
 660                  {
 661                      $userfield_IDs = $DB->get_results( '
 662                                  SELECT uf_ID, uf_ufdf_ID
 663                                      FROM T_users__fields
 664                                   WHERE uf_user_ID = '.$user_id );
 665                      foreach( $userfield_IDs as $userfield_ID )
 666                      {
 667                          $uf_val = param( 'uf_'.$userfield_ID->uf_ID, 'string', '' );
 668                          $uf_type = $userfield_ID->uf_ufdf_ID;
 669                          if( !empty($uf_val) )
 670                          {
 671                              $this->userfield_add( $uf_type, $uf_val );
 672                          }
 673                      }
 674                  }
 675              }
 676  
 677              $uf_new_fields = param( 'uf_new', 'array/array/string' );    // Recommended & required fields (it still not saved in DB)
 678              $uf_add_fields = param( 'uf_add', 'array/array/string' );    // Added fields
 679  
 680              // Add a new field: (JS is not enabled)
 681              if( $action == 'add_field' )
 682              {    // Button 'Add' new field is pressed
 683                  $new_field_type = param( 'new_field_type', 'integer', 0 );
 684                  if( empty( $new_field_type ) )
 685                  {    // We cannot add a new field without type
 686                      param_error( 'new_field_type', T_('Please select a field type.') );
 687                  }
 688                  else
 689                  {    // Save an adding field(in the array) to display it again if errors will be exist
 690                      $new_field_type_exists = false;
 691  
 692                      if( $this->userfield_defs[$new_field_type][4] == 'allowed' || $this->userfield_defs[$new_field_type][4] == 'list' )
 693                      {    // This field can be duplicated
 694                          global $add_field_types;
 695                          $add_field_types = array( $new_field_type );
 696                      }
 697                      else
 698                      {    // We should to solve we can add this field or don't
 699                          if( ! isset( $uf_new_fields[$new_field_type] ) && ! isset( $uf_add_fields[$new_field_type] ) )
 700                          {    // User is adding this field first time
 701                              if( is_array( $userfield_IDs ) && count( $userfield_IDs ) > 0 )
 702                              {    // User has fields that saved in DB
 703                                  foreach( $userfield_IDs as $userfield )
 704                                  {
 705                                      if( $userfield->uf_ufdf_ID == $new_field_type )
 706                                      {    // New adding field already exists for current user in DB
 707                                          $new_field_type_exists = true;
 708                                          break;
 709                                      }
 710                                  }
 711                              }
 712                              if( ! $new_field_type_exists )
 713                              {    // Field doesn't still exist for current user
 714                                  global $add_field_types;
 715                                  $add_field_types = array( $new_field_type );
 716                              }
 717                          }
 718                          else
 719                          {    // Field exists, no duplicates available
 720                              $new_field_type_exists = true;
 721                          }
 722  
 723                          if( $new_field_type_exists )
 724                          {    // Field already is added for current user, we should display error about this
 725                              param_error( 'new_field_type', T_('You already added this field, please select another.') );
 726                          }
 727                      }
 728  
 729                      if( ! $new_field_type_exists )
 730                      {    // Mark a new field to enter a value
 731                          param_error( 'uf_add['.$new_field_type.'][]', T_('Please enter a value in this new field.') );
 732                      }
 733                  }
 734              }
 735  
 736              // Save a New recommended & require fields AND Adding fields
 737              if( count( $uf_new_fields ) > 0 || count( $uf_add_fields ) > 0 )
 738              {
 739                  $uf_fields = array(
 740                      'new' => $uf_new_fields,
 741                      'add' => $uf_add_fields
 742                  );
 743                  foreach( $uf_fields as $uf_type => $uf_new_fields )
 744                  {
 745                      if( $uf_type == 'add' )
 746                      {    // Save an adding fields to display it again if errors will be exist
 747                          global $add_field_types;
 748                          if( ! isset( $add_field_types ) )
 749                          {    // Don't rewrite already existing array
 750                              $add_field_types = array();
 751                          }
 752                      }
 753                      foreach( $uf_new_fields as $uf_new_id => $uf_new_vals )
 754                      {
 755                          foreach( $uf_new_vals as $uf_new_val )
 756                          {
 757                              if( $this->userfield_defs[$uf_new_id][0] == 'list' && $uf_new_val == '---' )
 758                              {    // Option list has a value '---' for empty value
 759                                  $uf_new_val = '';
 760                              }
 761  
 762                              $uf_new_val = trim( strip_tags( $uf_new_val ) );
 763                              if( $uf_new_val != '' )
 764                              {    // Insert a new field in DB if it is filled
 765                                  if( $this->userfield_defs[$uf_new_id][0] == 'url' )
 766                                  {    // Check url fields
 767                                      param_check_url( 'uf_'.$uf_type.'['.$uf_new_id.'][]', 'commenting' );
 768                                  }
 769                                  if( $this->userfield_defs[$uf_new_id][4] == 'list' )
 770                                  {    // Option "Multiple values" == "List style"
 771                                      // Split by comma and save each phrase as separate field
 772                                      $uf_new_val = explode( ',', $uf_new_val );
 773                                      foreach( $uf_new_val as $val )
 774                                      {
 775                                          $val = trim( $val );
 776                                          if( !empty( $val ) )
 777                                          {    // Exclude empty values(spaces)
 778                                              $this->userfield_add( (int)$uf_new_id, $val );
 779                                          }
 780                                      }
 781                                  }
 782                                  else
 783                                  {    // Forbidden & Allowed fields
 784                                      $this->userfield_add( (int)$uf_new_id, $uf_new_val );
 785                                  }
 786                              }
 787                              elseif( empty( $uf_new_val ) && $this->userfield_defs[$uf_new_id][2] == 'require' )
 788                              {    // Display error for empty required field & new adding field
 789                                  if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
 790                                  {    // Display a note message if user can edit all users
 791                                      param_add_message_to_Log( 'uf_'.$uf_type.'['.$uf_new_id.'][]', sprintf( T_('Please enter a value for the field "%s".'), $this->userfield_defs[$uf_new_id][1] ), 'note' );
 792                                  }
 793                                  else
 794                                  {    // Display an error message
 795                                      param_error( 'uf_'.$uf_type.'['.$uf_new_id.'][]', T_('Please enter a value.') );
 796                                  }
 797                              }
 798  
 799                              if( $uf_type == 'add' )
 800                              {    // Save new added field, it used on the _user_identity.form
 801                                  $add_field_types[] = $uf_new_id;
 802                              }
 803                          }
 804                      }
 805                  }
 806              }
 807              // ---- Additional Fields / END ----
 808  
 809              // update profileupdate_date, because a publicly visible user property was changed
 810              $this->set_profileupdate_date();
 811          }
 812  
 813          // ******* Password form ******* //
 814  
 815          $is_password_form = param( 'password_form', 'boolean', false );
 816          if( $is_password_form || $is_new_user )
 817          {
 818              $reqID = param( 'reqID', 'string', '' );
 819  
 820              if( $is_new_user || ( !empty( $reqID ) && $reqID == $Session->get( 'core.changepwd.request_id' ) ) )
 821              { // current password is not required:
 822                  //   - new user creating process
 823                  //   - password change requested by email
 824                  param( 'edited_user_pass1', 'string', true );
 825                  $edited_user_pass2 = param( 'edited_user_pass2', 'string', true );
 826  
 827                  if( param_check_passwords( 'edited_user_pass1', 'edited_user_pass2', true, $Settings->get('user_minpwdlen') ) )
 828                  { // We can set password
 829                      $this->set( 'pass', md5( $edited_user_pass2 ) );
 830                  }
 831              }
 832              else
 833              {
 834                  // ******* Password edit form ****** //
 835                  param( 'edited_user_pass1', 'string', true );
 836                  $edited_user_pass2 = param( 'edited_user_pass2', 'string', true );
 837  
 838                  $current_user_pass = param( 'current_user_pass', 'string', true );
 839  
 840                  if( $this->ID != $current_User->ID )
 841                  { // Set the messages when admin changes a password of other user
 842                      $checkpwd_params = array(
 843                              'msg_pass_new'   => T_('Please enter new password.'),
 844                              'msg_pass_twice' => T_('Please enter new password twice.'),
 845                          );
 846                  }
 847                  else
 848                  { // Use default messages
 849                      $checkpwd_params = array();
 850                  }
 851  
 852                  if( ! strlen($current_user_pass) )
 853                  {
 854                      param_error('current_user_pass' , T_('Please enter your current password.') );
 855                      param_check_passwords( 'edited_user_pass1', 'edited_user_pass2', true, $Settings->get('user_minpwdlen'), $checkpwd_params );
 856                  }
 857                  else
 858                  {
 859                      if( $has_full_access && $this->ID != $current_User->ID )
 860                      { // Admin is changing a password of other user, Check a password of current admin
 861                          $pass_to_check = $current_User->pass;
 862                      }
 863                      else
 864                      { // User is changing own pasword
 865                          $pass_to_check = $this->pass;
 866                      }
 867                      if( $pass_to_check == md5($current_user_pass) )
 868                      {
 869                          if( param_check_passwords( 'edited_user_pass1', 'edited_user_pass2', true, $Settings->get('user_minpwdlen'), $checkpwd_params ) )
 870                          { // We can set password
 871                              $this->set( 'pass', md5( $edited_user_pass2 ) );
 872                          }
 873                      }
 874                      else
 875                      {
 876                          param_error('current_user_pass' , T_('Your current password is incorrect.') );
 877                          param_check_passwords( 'edited_user_pass1', 'edited_user_pass2', true, $Settings->get('user_minpwdlen'), $checkpwd_params );
 878                      }
 879                  }
 880  
 881              }
 882          }
 883  
 884  
 885          // Used in Preferences & Notifications forms
 886          $has_messaging_perm = $this->check_perm( 'perm_messaging', 'reply' );
 887  
 888          // ******* Preferences form ******* //
 889  
 890          $is_preferences_form = param( 'preferences_form', 'boolean', false );
 891  
 892          if( $is_preferences_form )
 893          {
 894              // Other preferences
 895              param( 'edited_user_locale', 'string', true );
 896              $this->set_from_Request('locale', 'edited_user_locale', true);
 897  
 898              // Session timeout
 899              $edited_user_timeout_sessions = param( 'edited_user_timeout_sessions', 'string', NULL );
 900              if( isset( $edited_user_timeout_sessions ) && ( $current_User->ID == $this->ID  || $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) ) )
 901              {
 902                  switch( $edited_user_timeout_sessions )
 903                  {
 904                      case 'default':
 905                          $UserSettings->set( 'timeout_sessions', NULL, $this->ID );
 906                          break;
 907                      case 'custom':
 908                          $UserSettings->set( 'timeout_sessions', param_duration( 'timeout_sessions' ), $this->ID );
 909                          break;
 910                  }
 911              }
 912  
 913              $UserSettings->set( 'show_online', param( 'edited_user_showonline', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 914          }
 915  
 916          // ******* Notifications form ******* //
 917          $is_subscriptions_form = param( 'subscriptions_form', 'boolean', false );
 918  
 919          if( $is_subscriptions_form )
 920          {
 921              if( $action == 'subscribe' )
 922              { // Do only subscribe to new blog (Don't update the user's settings from the same form)
 923  
 924                  // A selected blog to subscribe
 925                  $subscribe_blog_ID = param( 'subscribe_blog', 'integer', 0 );
 926                  // Get checkbox values:
 927                  $sub_items    = param( 'sub_items_new',    'integer', 0 );
 928                  $sub_comments = param( 'sub_comments_new', 'integer', 0 );
 929  
 930                  // Note: we do not check if subscriptions are allowed here, but we check at the time we're about to send something
 931                  if( $subscribe_blog_ID && ( $sub_items || $sub_comments ) )
 932                  { // We need to record values:
 933                      $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_subscriptions( sub_coll_ID, sub_user_ID, sub_items, sub_comments )
 934                        VALUES ( '.$DB->quote( $subscribe_blog_ID ).', '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ).', '.$DB->quote( $sub_items ).', '.$DB->quote( $sub_comments ).' )' );
 935  
 936                      $Messages->add( T_('Subscriptions have been changed.'), 'success' );
 937                  }
 938                  else
 939                  { // Display an error message to inform user about incorrect actions
 940                      $Messages->add( T_('Please select at least one setting to subscribe on the selected blog.'), 'error' );
 941                  }
 942              }
 943              else
 944              { // Update user's settings
 945  
 946                  // Email communication
 947                  $edited_user_email = evo_strtolower( param( 'edited_user_email', 'string', true ) );
 948                  param_check_not_empty( 'edited_user_email', T_('Please enter your e-mail address.') );
 949                  param_check_email( 'edited_user_email', true );
 950                  $this->set_email( $edited_user_email );
 951  
 952                  // set messaging options
 953                  if( $has_messaging_perm )
 954                  {
 955                      $UserSettings->set( 'enable_PM', param( 'PM', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 956                  }
 957                  $emails_msgform = $Settings->get( 'emails_msgform' );
 958                  if( ( $emails_msgform == 'userset' ) || ( ( $emails_msgform == 'adminset' ) && ( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) ) ) )
 959                  { // enable email option is displayed only if user can set or if admin can set and current User is an administrator
 960                      $UserSettings->set( 'enable_email', param( 'email', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 961                  }
 962  
 963                  // Email format
 964                  $UserSettings->set( 'email_format', param( 'edited_user_email_format', 'string', 'auto' ), $this->ID );
 965  
 966                  // set notification options
 967                  if( $has_messaging_perm )
 968                  { // update 'notify messages' only if user has messaging rights and this option was displayed
 969                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_messages', param( 'edited_user_notify_messages', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 970                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_unread_messages', param( 'edited_user_notify_unread_messages', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 971                  }
 972                  if( $this->check_role( 'post_owner' ) )
 973                  { // update 'notify_published_comments' only if user has at least one post or user has right to create new post
 974                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_published_comments', param( 'edited_user_notify_publ_comments', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 975                  }
 976                  $is_comment_moderator = $this->check_role( 'comment_moderator' );
 977                  if( $is_comment_moderator || $this->check_role( 'comment_editor' ) )
 978                  { // update 'notify_comment_moderation' only if user is comment moderator/editor at least in one blog
 979                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_comment_moderation', param( 'edited_user_notify_cmt_moderation', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 980                  }
 981                  if( $is_comment_moderator )
 982                  { // update 'send_cmt_moderation_reminder' only if user is comment moderator at least in one blog
 983                      $UserSettings->set( 'send_cmt_moderation_reminder', param( 'edited_user_send_cmt_moderation_reminder', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 984                  }
 985                  if( $this->check_role( 'post_moderator' ) )
 986                  { // update 'notify_post_moderation' only if user is post moderator at least in one blog
 987                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_post_moderation', param( 'edited_user_notify_post_moderation', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 988                  }
 989                  if( $this->grp_ID == 1 )
 990                  {
 991                      $UserSettings->set( 'send_activation_reminder', param( 'edited_user_send_activation_reminder', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 992                  }
 993  
 994                  if( $this->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
 995                  { // edited user has permission to edit all users, save notification preferences
 996                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_new_user_registration', param( 'edited_user_notify_new_user_registration', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 997                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_activated_account', param( 'edited_user_notify_activated_account', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 998                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_closed_account', param( 'edited_user_notify_closed_account', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
 999                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_reported_account', param( 'edited_user_notify_reported_account', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1000                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_changed_account', param( 'edited_user_notify_changed_account', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1001                  }
1002  
1003                  if( $this->check_perm( 'options', 'edit' ) )
1004                  { // edited user has permission to edit options, save notification preferences
1005                      $UserSettings->set( 'notify_cronjob_error', param( 'edited_user_notify_cronjob_error', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1006                  }
1007  
1008                  // Newsletter
1009                  $UserSettings->set( 'newsletter_news', param( 'edited_user_newsletter_news', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1010                  $UserSettings->set( 'newsletter_ads', param( 'edited_user_newsletter_ads', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1011  
1012                  // Emails limit per day
1013                  param_integer_range( 'edited_user_notification_email_limit', 0, 999, T_('Notificaiton email limit must be between %d and %d.') );
1014                  $UserSettings->set( 'notification_email_limit', param( 'edited_user_notification_email_limit', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1015                  param_integer_range( 'edited_user_newsletter_limit', 0, 999, T_('Newsletter limit must be between %d and %d.') );
1016                  $UserSettings->set( 'newsletter_limit', param( 'edited_user_newsletter_limit', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1017  
1018                  /**
1019                   * Update the subscriptions:
1020                   */
1021                  $subs_blog_IDs = param( 'subs_blog_IDs', 'string', true );
1022                  $subs_item_IDs = param( 'subs_item_IDs', 'string', true );
1023  
1024                  // Work the blogs:
1025                  $subscription_values = array();
1026                  $unsubscribed = array();
1027                  $subs_blog_IDs = explode( ',', $subs_blog_IDs );
1028                  foreach( $subs_blog_IDs as $loop_blog_ID )
1029                  {
1030                      // Make sure no dirty hack is coming in here:
1031                      $loop_blog_ID = intval( $loop_blog_ID );
1032  
1033                      // Get checkbox values:
1034                      $sub_items    = param( 'sub_items_'.$loop_blog_ID,    'integer', 0 );
1035                      $sub_comments = param( 'sub_comments_'.$loop_blog_ID, 'integer', 0 );
1036  
1037                      if( $sub_items || $sub_comments )
1038                      {    // We have a subscription for this blog
1039                          $subscription_values[] = "( $loop_blog_ID, $this->ID, $sub_items, $sub_comments )";
1040                      }
1041                      else
1042                      {    // No subscription here:
1043                          $unsubscribed[] = $loop_blog_ID;
1044                      }
1045                  }
1046  
1047                  // Note: we do not check if subscriptions are allowed here, but we check at the time we're about to send something
1048                  if( count( $subscription_values ) )
1049                  {    // We need to record values:
1050                      $DB->query( 'REPLACE INTO T_subscriptions( sub_coll_ID, sub_user_ID, sub_items, sub_comments )
1051                                                  VALUES '.implode( ', ', $subscription_values ) );
1052                  }
1053  
1054                  if( count( $unsubscribed ) )
1055                  {    // We need to make sure some values are cleared:
1056                      $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_subscriptions
1057                                                   WHERE sub_user_ID = '.$this->ID.'
1058                                                       AND sub_coll_ID IN ('.implode( ', ', $unsubscribed ).')' );
1059                  }
1060  
1061                  // Individual post subscriptions
1062                  if( !empty( $subs_item_IDs ) )
1063                  { // user was subscribed to at least one post update notification
1064                      $subs_item_IDs = explode( ',', $subs_item_IDs );
1065                      $unsubscribed = array();
1066                      foreach( $subs_item_IDs as $loop_item_ID )
1067                      {
1068                          if( !param( 'item_sub_'.$loop_item_ID, 'integer', 0 ) )
1069                          { // user wants to unsubscribe from this post notifications
1070                              $unsubscribed[] = $loop_item_ID;
1071                          }
1072                      }
1073                      if( !empty( $unsubscribed ) )
1074                      { // unsubscribe list is not empty, delete not wanted subscriptions
1075                          $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_items__subscriptions
1076                                                   WHERE isub_user_ID = '.$this->ID.'
1077                                                       AND isub_item_ID IN ('.implode( ', ', $unsubscribed ).')' );
1078                      }
1079                  }
1080              }
1081          }
1082  
1083          // ******* Advanced form ******* //
1084          $is_advanced_form = param( 'advanced_form', 'boolean', false );
1085  
1086          if( $is_advanced_form )
1087          {
1088              $UserSettings->set( 'admin_skin', param( 'edited_user_admin_skin', 'string' ), $this->ID );
1089  
1090              // Action icon params:
1091              param_integer_range( 'edited_user_action_icon_threshold', 1, 5, T_('The threshold must be between 1 and 5.') );
1092              $UserSettings->set( 'action_icon_threshold', param( 'edited_user_action_icon_threshold', 'integer', true ), $this->ID );
1093  
1094              param_integer_range( 'edited_user_action_word_threshold', 1, 5, T_('The threshold must be between 1 and 5.') );
1095              $UserSettings->set( 'action_word_threshold', param( 'edited_user_action_word_threshold', 'integer'), $this->ID );
1096  
1097              $UserSettings->set( 'display_icon_legend', param( 'edited_user_legend', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1098  
1099              // Set bozo validador activation
1100              $UserSettings->set( 'control_form_abortions', param( 'edited_user_bozo', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1101  
1102              // Focus on first
1103              $UserSettings->set( 'focus_on_first_input', param( 'edited_user_focusonfirst', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1104  
1105              // Results per page
1106              $edited_user_results_page_size = param( 'edited_user_results_page_size', 'integer', NULL );
1107              if( isset( $edited_user_results_page_size ) )
1108              {
1109                  $UserSettings->set( 'results_per_page', $edited_user_results_page_size, $this->ID );
1110              }
1111          }
1112  
1113          if( $is_preferences_form || ( $is_identity_form && $is_new_user ) )
1114          {    // Multiple session
1115              $multiple_sessions = $Settings->get( 'multiple_sessions' );
1116              if( ( $multiple_sessions != 'adminset_default_no' && $multiple_sessions != 'adminset_default_yes' ) || $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
1117              {
1118                  $UserSettings->set( 'login_multiple_sessions', param( 'edited_user_set_login_multiple_sessions', 'integer', 0 ), $this->ID );
1119              }
1120          }
1121  
1122          return ! param_errors_detected();
1123      }
1124

1126      /**
1127       * Get a param
1128       *
1129       * @param string the parameter
1130       */
1131  	function get( $parname )
1132      {
1133          if( $this->check_status( 'is_closed' ) && ( !is_admin_page() ) && ( $parname != 'login' ) && ( $parname != 'status' ) )
1134          { // if this account is closed and we are not in backoffice, don't return other information then login or status
1135              return NULL;
1136          }
1137  
1138          switch( $parname )
1139          {
1140              case 'fullname':
1141                  return trim($this->firstname.' '.$this->lastname);
1142  
1143              case 'preferredname':
1144                  return $this->get_preferred_name();
1145  
1146              case 'num_posts':
1147                  return $this->get_num_posts();
1148  
1149              case 'num_comments':
1150                  return $this->get_num_comments();
1151  
1152              default:
1153              // All other params:
1154                  return parent::get( $parname );
1155          }
1156      }

1160       * Get the name of the account with complete details for admin select lists
1161       *
1162       * @return string
1163       */
1164  	function get_account_name()
1165      {
1166          if( $this->check_status( 'is_closed' ) && ( !is_admin_page() ) )
1167          { // don't return closed accounts information except login name
1168              return $this->login;
1169          }
1170  
1171          return $this->login.' - '.$this->firstname.' '.$this->lastname.' ('.$this->nickname.')';
1172      }

1175      /**
1176       * Get link to User
1177       *
1178       * @return string
1179       */
1180  	function get_link( $params = array() )
1181      {
1182          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
1183          $params = array_merge( array(
1184                  'format'       => 'htmlbody',
1185                  'link_to'      => 'userpage', // userurl userpage 'userurl>userpage'
1186                  'link_text'    => 'preferredname', // avatar | preferredname
1187                  'link_rel'     => '',
1188                  'link_class'   => '',
1189                  'thumb_size'   => 'crop-top-32x32',
1190                  'thumb_class'  => '',
1191              ), $params );
1192  
1193          if( $params['link_text'] == 'avatar' )
1194          {
1195              $r = $this->get_avatar_imgtag( $params['thumb_size'], $params['thumb_class'] );
1196          }
1197          else
1198          {
1199              $r = $this->dget( 'preferredname', $params['format'] );
1200          }
1201  
1202          switch( $params['link_to'] )
1203          {
1204              case 'userpage':
1205              case 'userpage>userurl':
1206                  $url = $this->get_userpage_url();
1207                  break;
1208  
1209              case 'userurl':
1210                  $url = $this->url;
1211                  break;
1212  
1213              case 'userurl>userpage':
1214                  // We give priority to user submitted url:
1215                  if( evo_strlen($this->url) > 10 )
1216                  {
1217                      $url = $this->url;
1218                  }
1219                  else
1220                  {
1221                      $url = $this->get_userpage_url();
1222                  }
1223                  break;
1224          }
1225  
1226          if( !empty($url) )
1227          {
1228              $link = '<a href="'.$url.'"';
1229              if( !empty($params['link_rel']) )
1230              {
1231                  $link .= ' rel="'.$params['link_rel'].'"';
1232              }
1233              if( !empty($params['link_class']) )
1234              {
1235                  $link .= ' class="'.$params['link_class'].'"';
1236              }
1237              $r = $link.'>'.$r.'</a>';
1238          }
1239  
1240          return $r;
1241      }
1242

1244      /**
1245       * Get preferred name of the user
1246       *
1247       * @return string
1248       */
1249  	function get_preferred_name()
1250      {
1251          if( $this->check_status( 'is_closed' ) && ( !is_admin_page() ) )
1252          { // don't return closed accounts information except login name
1253              return $this->login;
1254          }
1255  
1256          if( !empty( $this->nickname ) )
1257          {    // Nickname
1258              return $this->get( 'nickname' );
1259          }
1260          elseif( !empty( $this->firstname ) || !empty( $this->lastname ) )
1261          {    // First name
1262              return $this->get('fullname');
1263          }
1264          else
1265          {    // Login
1266              return $this->get( 'login' );
1267          }
1268      }

1271      /**
1272       * Get user's login with gender color
1273       *
1274       * @param array Params
1275       * @return string User's preferred name with gender color if this available
1276       */
1277  	function get_colored_login( $params = array() )
1278      {
1279          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
1280          $params = array_merge( array(
1281                  'mask'         => '$login$', // $avatar$ $login$
1282                  'login_format' => 'htmlbody',
1283                  'avatar_size'  => 'crop-top-15x15',
1284              ), $params );
1285  
1286          $avatar = '';
1287          $login = '';
1288  
1289          if( strpos( $params['mask'], '$login$' ) !== false )
1290          {    // Display login
1291              $login = $this->dget( 'login', $params['login_format'] );
1292          }
1293  
1294          if( strpos( $params['mask'], '$avatar$' ) !== false )
1295          {    // Display avatar
1296              $avatar = $this->get_avatar_imgtag( $params['avatar_size'], '' );
1297          }
1298  
1299          $mask = array( '$login$', '$avatar$' );
1300          $data = array( $login, $avatar );
1301  
1302          return '<span class="'.$this->get_gender_class().'">'.str_replace( $mask, $data, $params['mask'] ).'</span>';
1303      }

1306      /**
1307       * Get User identity link, which is a composite of user avatar and login, both point to the specific user profile tab.
1308       *
1309       * @return string User avatar and login if the identity link is not available, the identity link otherwise.
1310       */
1311  	function get_identity_link( $params = array() )
1312      {
1313          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
1314          $params = array_merge( array(
1315                  'link_text'      => 'avatar', // avatar | only_avatar | login | nickname | firstname | lastname | fullname | preferredname
1316                  'thumb_size'     => 'crop-top-15x15',
1317                  'thumb_class'    => 'avatar_before_login',
1318                  'thumb_zoomable' => false,
1319                  'login_mask'     => '', // example: 'text $login$ text'
1320                  'display_bubbletip' => true,
1321                  'nowrap'         => true,
1322              ), $params );
1323  
1324          $identity_url = get_user_identity_url( $this->ID );
1325  
1326          $attr_bubbletip = '';
1327          if( $params['display_bubbletip'] )
1328          {    // Set attribute to initialize a bubbletip
1329              $attr_bubbletip = ' rel="bubbletip_user_'.$this->ID.'"';
1330          }
1331  
1332          $avatar_tag = '';
1333          if( $params['link_text'] == 'avatar' || $params['link_text'] == 'only_avatar' )
1334          {
1335              $avatar_tag = $this->get_avatar_imgtag( $params['thumb_size'], $params['thumb_class'], '', $params['thumb_zoomable'] );
1336              if( $params['thumb_zoomable'] )
1337              { // User avatar is zoomable
1338                  // Add tag param to init bubbletip
1339                  $avatar_tag = str_replace( '<img ', '<img rel="bubbletip_user_'.$this->ID.'"', $avatar_tag );
1340                  return $avatar_tag; // We should exit here, to avoid the double adding of tag <a>
1341              }
1342          }
1343  
1344          $link_login = '';
1345          $class = empty( $params['link_class'] ) ? '' : $params['link_class'];
1346          if( $params['link_text'] != 'only_avatar' )
1347          { // Display a login, nickname, firstname, lastname, fullname or preferredname
1348              switch( $params['link_text'] )
1349              {
1350                  case 'login':
1351                  case 'avatar':
1352                      $link_login = $this->login;
1353                      break;
1354                  case 'nickname':
1355                      $link_login = $this->nickname;
1356                      break;
1357                  case 'firstname':
1358                      $link_login = $this->firstname;
1359                      break;
1360                  case 'lastname':
1361                      $link_login = $this->lastname;
1362                      break;
1363                  case 'fullname':
1364                      $link_login = $this->firstname.' '.$this->lastname;
1365                      break;
1366                  case 'preferredname':
1367                      $link_login = $this->get_preferred_name();
1368                      break;
1369              }
1370              $link_login = trim( $link_login );
1371              if( empty( $link_login ) )
1372              { // Use a login by default if a selected field is empty
1373                  $link_login = $this->login;
1374              }
1375              if( $params['login_mask'] != '' )
1376              { // Apply login mask
1377                  $link_login = str_replace( '$login$', $link_login, $params['login_mask'] );
1378              }
1379          }
1380  
1381          $class .= ' '.$this->get_gender_class().( $params['nowrap'] ? ' nowrap' : '' );
1382  
1383          if( empty( $identity_url ) )
1384          {
1385              return '<span class="'.trim( $class ).'"'.$attr_bubbletip.'>'.$avatar_tag.$link_login.'</span>';
1386          }
1387  
1388          $link_title = T_( 'Show the user profile' );
1389          return '<a href="'.$identity_url.'" title="'.$link_title.'" class="'.trim( $class ).'"'.$attr_bubbletip.'>'.$avatar_tag.$link_login.'</a>';
1390      }

1393      /**
1394       * Get Regional object
1395       *
1396       * @param string Object name (Country, Region, Subregion, City)
1397       * @param string ID name
1398       * @return object
1399       */
1400      function & get_Regional( $Object, $ID )
1401      {
1402          if( $this->check_status( 'is_closed' ) && ( !is_admin_page() ) )
1403          { // don't return closed accounts regional information to front office
1404              return false;
1405          }
1406  
1407          if( is_null($this->$Object) && !empty($this->$ID ) )
1408          {
1409              $Cache = & call_user_func( 'get_'.$Object.'Cache' );
1410              $this->$Object = $Cache->get_by_ID( $this->$ID, false );
1411          }
1412  
1413          return $this->$Object;
1414      }

1417      /**
1418       * Get Regional name
1419       *
1420       * @param string Object name (Country, Region, Subregion, City)
1421       * @param string ID name
1422       * @return string Name of Country, Region, Subregion or City
1423       */
1424  	function get_regional_name( $Object, $ID )
1425      {
1426          if( $this->get_Regional( $Object, $ID ) )
1427          {    // We have an regional object:
1428              return $this->$Object->name;
1429          }
1430  
1431          return '';
1432      }

1524      /**
1525       * Get the number of posts for the user.
1526       *
1527       * @param string Posts status
1528       * @return integer
1529       */
1530  	function get_num_posts( $status = '' )
1531      {
1532          global $DB;
1533          global $collections_Module;
1534  
1535          if( isset( $collections_Module ) && is_null( $this->_num_posts ) )
1536          {
1537              $SQL = new SQL( 'Get the number of posts for the user' );
1538              $SQL->SELECT( 'post_status, COUNT(*)' );
1539              $SQL->FROM( 'T_items__item' );
1540              $SQL->WHERE( 'post_creator_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
1541              $SQL->GROUP_BY( 'post_status' );
1542              $this->_num_posts = $DB->get_assoc( $SQL->get() );
1543  
1544              // Calc number of posts with all statuses
1545              $total_num_posts = 0;
1546              foreach( $this->_num_posts as $status_num_posts )
1547              {
1548                  $total_num_posts += $status_num_posts;
1549              }
1550              $this->_num_posts[''] = $total_num_posts;
1551          }
1552  
1553          return !empty( $this->_num_posts[ $status ] ) ? $this->_num_posts[ $status ] : 0;
1554      }
1555  
1556  
1557      /**
1558       * Get the number of comments for the user.
1559       *
1560       * @param string Comments status
1561       * @param boolean Count already recycled comments
1562       * @return integer
1563       */
1564  	function get_num_comments( $status = '', $count_recycled = false )
1565      {
1566          global $DB;
1567          global $collections_Module;
1568  
1569          if( isset( $collections_Module ) && is_null( $this->_num_comments ) )
1570          {
1571              $SQL = new SQL( 'Get the number of comments for the user' );
1572              $SQL->SELECT( 'comment_status, COUNT(*)' );
1573              $SQL->FROM( 'T_comments' );
1574              $SQL->WHERE( 'comment_author_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
1575              $SQL->GROUP_BY( 'comment_status' );
1576              $this->_num_comments = $DB->get_assoc( $SQL->get() );
1577  
1578              // Calc number of comments with all statuses
1579              $total_num_comments = 0;
1580              foreach( $this->_num_comments as $curr_status => $status_num_comments )
1581              {
1582                  if( $count_recycled || ( $curr_status != 'trash' ) )
1583                  {
1584                      $total_num_comments += $status_num_comments;
1585                  }
1586              }
1587              $this->_num_comments[''] = $total_num_comments;
1588          }
1589  
1590          return !empty( $this->_num_comments[ $status ] ) ? $this->_num_comments[ $status ] : 0;
1591      }

1596       *

1600  	function get_num_sessions( $link_sessions = false )
1601      {

1605                                              FROM T_sessions

1607

1609          {

1617      /**
1618       * Get the number of user messages
1619       *
1620       * @param string Type ( sent | received )
1621       * @return integer the number of requested type of messages
1622       */
1623  	function get_num_messages( $type = 'sent' )
1624      {
1625          global $DB;
1626  
1627          if( $type == 'received' )
1628          {    // Get a count of messages received
1629              $SQL = new SQL();
1630              $SQL->SELECT( 'COUNT( msg_ID )' );
1631              $SQL->FROM( 'T_messaging__threadstatus' );
1632              $SQL->FROM_add( 'LEFT JOIN T_messaging__message ON tsta_thread_ID = msg_thread_ID' );
1633              $SQL->WHERE( 'tsta_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
1634              $SQL->WHERE_and( 'msg_author_user_ID != '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
1635          }
1636          else
1637          {    // Get a count of messages sent
1638              $SQL = new SQL();
1639              $SQL->SELECT( 'COUNT( msg_ID )' );
1640              $SQL->FROM( 'T_messaging__message' );
1641              $SQL->WHERE( 'msg_author_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
1642          }
1643  
1644          return $DB->get_var( $SQL->get() );
1645      }

1666      /**
1667       * Get the path to the media directory. If it does not exist, it will be created.
1668       *
1669       * If we're {@link is_admin_page() on an admin page}, it adds status messages.
1670       * @todo These status messages should rather go to a "syslog" and not be displayed to a normal user
1671       * @todo dh> refactor this into e.g. create_media_dir() and use it for Blog::get_media_dir, too.
1672       *
1673       * @param boolean Create the directory, if it does not exist yet?
1674       * @return mixed the path as string on success, false if the dir could not be created
1675       */
1676  	function get_media_dir( $create = true )
1677      {
1678          global $media_path, $Messages, $Settings, $Debuglog;
1679  
1680          if( ! $Settings->get( 'fm_enable_roots_user' ) )
1681          {    // User directories are disabled:
1682              $Debuglog->add( 'Attempt to access user media dir, but this feature is disabled', 'files' );
1683              return false;
1684          }
1685  
1686          $userdir = get_canonical_path( $media_path.$this->get_media_subpath() );
1687  
1688          if( $create && ! is_dir( $userdir ) )
1689          {
1690              if( ! is_writable( dirname($userdir) ) )
1691              { // add error
1692                  if( is_admin_page() )
1693                  {
1694                      $Messages->add( sprintf( T_("The user's media directory &laquo;%s&raquo; could not be created, because the parent directory is not writable or does not exist."), rel_path_to_base($userdir) )
1695                              .get_manual_link('directory_creation_error'), 'error' );
1696                  }
1697                  return false;
1698              }
1699              elseif( ! evo_mkdir( $userdir ) )
1700              { // add error
1701                  if( is_admin_page() )
1702                  {
1703                      $Messages->add( sprintf( T_("The user's media directory &laquo;%s&raquo; could not be created."), rel_path_to_base($userdir) )
1704                              .get_manual_link('directory_creation_error'), 'error' );
1705                  }
1706                  return false;
1707              }
1708              else
1709              { // add note:
1710                  if( is_admin_page() )
1711                  {
1712                      $Messages->add( sprintf( T_("The user's directory &laquo;%s&raquo; has been created with permissions %s."), rel_path_to_base($userdir), substr( sprintf('%o', fileperms($userdir)), -3 ) ), 'success' );
1713                  }
1714              }
1715          }
1716          return $userdir;
1717      }

1720      /**
1721       * Get the URL to the media folder
1722       *
1723       * @return string the URL
1724       */
1725  	function get_media_url()
1726      {
1727          global $media_url, $Settings, $Debuglog;
1728          global $Blog;
1729  
1730          if( ! $Settings->get( 'fm_enable_roots_user' ) )
1731          {    // User directories are disabled:
1732              $Debuglog->add( 'Attempt to access user media URL, but this feature is disabled', 'files' );
1733              return false;
1734          }
1735  
1736          if( isset($Blog) )
1737          {    // We are currently looking at a blog. We are going to consider (for now) that we want the users and their files
1738              // to appear as being part of that blog.
1739              return $Blog->get_local_media_url().$this->get_media_subpath();
1740          }
1741  
1742          // System media url:
1743          return $media_url.$this->get_media_subpath();
1744      }

1747      /**
1748       * Get user media directory subpath, e.g. users/{login}/ or users/usr_{user ID}/
1749       */
1750  	function get_media_subpath()
1751      {
1752          if( is_valid_login( $this->login, true ) )
1753          {    // Valid ASCII login, use it as is
1754              return 'users/'.$this->login.'/';
1755          }
1756          else
1757          {    // Non-ASCII login
1758              return 'users/usr_'.$this->ID.'/';
1759          }
1760      }
