1805      /**
1806       * Get url from defined userfields
1807       *
1808       * @param boolean TRUE if we want get a value from url fields of the table T_users__fields, FALSE - get from $this->url
1809       * @return string Url
1810       */
1811  	function get_field_url( $from_extra_fields = false )
1812      {
1813          global $DB;
1814  
1815          if( $from_extra_fields )
1816          {    // Get value from DB or from cache
1817              if( isset( $this->field_url ) )
1818              {    // Get url from variable already defined in first calling of this method
1819                  return $this->field_url;
1820              }
1821              else
1822              {    // Get value from DB
1823                  $this->field_url = (string)$DB->get_var( '
1824                      SELECT uf_varchar
1825                          FROM T_users__fields
1826                              LEFT JOIN T_users__fielddefs ON uf_ufdf_ID = ufdf_ID
1827                              LEFT JOIN T_users__fieldgroups ON ufdf_ufgp_ID = ufgp_ID
1828                      WHERE uf_user_ID = '.$this->ID.'
1829                          AND ufdf_type = "url"
1830                      ORDER BY ufgp_order, ufdf_order, uf_ID
1831                      LIMIT 1' );
1832                  return $this->field_url;
1833              }
1834          }
1835          else
1836          {    // Get value from $this->url (T_users)
1837              return $this->url;
1838          }
1839      }

1843       * Get link from defined userfields

1847       */
1848  	function get_field_link( $params = array() )
1849      {
1850          $params = array_merge( array(
1851                  'target' => '_blank',
1852                  'rel'    => 'nofollow'
1853              ), $params );
1854  
1855          $link = '<a href="'.$this->get_field_url().'"'.get_field_attribs_as_string( $params, false ).'>'.$this->get_field_url().'</a>';
1856  
1857          return $link;
1858      }

1861      /**
1862       * Set param value
1863       *
1864       * @param string parameter name
1865       * @param mixed parameter value
1866       * @param boolean true to set to NULL if empty value
1867       * @return boolean true, if a value has been set; false if it has not changed
1868       */
1869  	function set( $parname, $parvalue, $make_null = false )
1870      {
1871          if( isset( $this->$parname ) && ( ! isset( $this->significant_changed_values[ $parname ] ) ) && ( ( $old_value = $this->get( $parname ) ) != $parvalue )
1872              && in_array( $parname, array( 'login', 'group_ID', 'nickname', 'firstname', 'lastname', 'gender', 'ctry_ID', 'rgn_ID', 'subrg_ID', 'city_ID' ) ) )
1873          { // Save previous value of significant changes for later use in send_account_changed_notifications()
1874              $this->significant_changed_values[ $parname ] = $old_value;
1875          }
1876  
1877          switch( $parname )
1878          {
1879              case 'level':
1880                  return $this->set_param( $parname, 'number', $parvalue, $make_null );
1881  
1882              case 'ctry_ID':
1883              default:
1884                  return $this->set_param( $parname, 'string', $parvalue, $make_null );
1885          }
1886      }

1890       * Set date created.
1891       *
1892       * @param integer seconds since Unix Epoch.
1893       */
1894  	function set_datecreated( $datecreated, $isYMDhour = false )
1895      {
1896          if( !$isYMDhour )
1897          {
1898              $datecreated = date('Y-m-d H:i:s', $datecreated );
1899          }
1900          // Set value:
1901          $this->datecreated = $datecreated;
1902          // Remmeber change for later db update:
1903          $this->dbchange( 'user_created_datetime', 'string', 'datecreated' );
1904      }

1907      /**
1908       * Set email address of the user.
1909       *
1910       * If the email address has changed and we're configured to invalidate the user in this case,
1911       * the user's account gets not active 'emaichanged' status here.
1912       *
1913       * @param string email address to set for the User
1914       * @param boolean Set TRUE if changing of account status is required
1915       * @return boolean true, if set; false if not changed
1916       */
1917  	function set_email( $email, $change_status = true )
1918      {
1919          global $Settings;
1920  
1921          $r = parent::set_param( 'email', 'string', evo_strtolower( $email ) );
1922  
1923          if( $change_status )
1924          { // Change user status to 'emailchanged' (if email has changed and Settings are available, which they are not during install):
1925              if( $r && ( $this->ID != 0 ) && isset($Settings) && $Settings->get('newusers_revalidate_emailchg') && ( $this->check_status( 'is_validated' ) ) )
1926              { // Deactivate the account, because the changed email has not been verified yet, but the user account is active:
1927                  $this->set( 'status', 'emailchanged' );
1928              }
1929          }
1930  
1931          if( preg_match( '#@(.+)#i', $email, $ematch ) )
1932          {    // Set email domain ID
1933              global $DB;
1934  
1935              $email_domain = $ematch[1];
1936  
1937              $SQL = new SQL();
1938              $SQL->SELECT( 'dom_ID' );
1939              $SQL->FROM( 'T_basedomains' );
1940              $SQL->WHERE( 'dom_type = \'email\'' );
1941              $SQL->WHERE_and( 'dom_name = '.$DB->quote( $email_domain ) );
1942  
1943              $dom_ID = $DB->get_var( $SQL->get() );
1944              if( !$dom_ID )
1945              {    // The email domains doesn't exist yet, Insert new record
1946                  $DB->query( 'INSERT INTO T_basedomains ( dom_type, dom_name )
1947                      VALUES ( \'email\', '.$DB->quote( $email_domain ).' )' );
1948                  $dom_ID = $DB->insert_id;
1949              }
1950  
1951              $this->set( 'email_dom_ID', (int) $dom_ID );
1952          }
1953  
1954          return $r;
1955      }
1956

1960       *
1961       * @param Group the Group object to put the user into
1962       * @return boolean true if set, false if not changed
1963       */
1964  	function set_Group( & $Group )
1965      {
1966          if( $this->grp_ID !== $Group->ID )
1967          {
1968              $this->Group = & $Group;
1969              $this->set( 'grp_ID', $Group->ID );
1970              return true;
1971          }
1972  
1973          return false;
1974      }

2003    /**
2004       * Check password
2005       *
2006       * @param string password
2007       * @param boolean Is the password parameter already MD5()'ed?
2008       * @return boolean
2009       */
2010  	function check_password( $pass, $pass_is_md5 = false )
2011      {
2012          if( !$pass_is_md5 )
2013          {
2014              $pass = md5( $pass );
2015          }
2016          // echo 'pass: ', $pass, '/', $this->pass;
2017  
2018          return ( $pass == $this->pass );
2019      }

2021  
2022      /**
2023       * Check permission for this user
2024       *
2025       * @param string Permission name, can be one of:
2026       *                - 'edit_timestamp'
2027       *                - 'cats_post_statuses', see {@link User::check_perm_catsusers()}
2028       *                - either group permission names, see {@link Group::check_perm()}
2029       *                - either blogusers permission names, see {@link User::check_perm_blogusers()}
2030       * @param string Permission level
2031       * @param boolean Execution will halt if this is !0 and permission is denied
2032       * @param mixed Permission target (blog ID, array of cat IDs, Item, Comment...)
2033       * @return boolean 0 if permission denied
2034       */
2035  	function check_perm( $permname, $permlevel = 'any', $assert = false, $perm_target = NULL )
2036      {
2037          global $Debuglog, $Settings;
2038  
2039          if( is_object($perm_target) && isset($perm_target->ID) )
2040          {
2041              $perm_target_ID = $perm_target->ID;
2042          }
2043          elseif( !is_array($perm_target) )
2044          {
2045              $perm_target_ID = $perm_target;
2046          }
2047  
2048          if( isset($perm_target_ID)    // if it makes sense to check the cache
2049              && isset($this->cache_perms[$permname][$permlevel][$perm_target_ID]) )
2050          { // Permission in available in Cache:
2051              $Debuglog->add( "Got perm [$permname][$permlevel][$perm_target_ID] from cache", 'perms' );
2052              return $this->cache_perms[$permname][$permlevel][$perm_target_ID];
2053          }
2054  
2055          $pluggable_perms = array( 'admin', 'spamblacklist', 'slugs', 'templates', 'options', 'files', 'users' );
2056          if( in_array( $permname, $pluggable_perms ) )
2057          {
2058              $permname = 'perm_'.$permname;
2059          }
2060          //$Debuglog->add( "Querying perm [$permname][$permlevel]".( isset( $perm_target_ID ) ? '['.$perm_target_ID.']' : '' ).']', 'perms' );
2061          //pre_dump( 'Perm target: '.var_export( $perm_target, true ) );
2062  
2063          $perm = false;
2064  
2065          switch( $permname )
2066          { // What permission do we want to check?
2067              case 'cats_post_statuses':
2068              case 'cats_post!published':
2069              case 'cats_post!community':
2070              case 'cats_post!protected':
2071              case 'cats_post!private':
2072              case 'cats_post!review':
2073              case 'cats_post!draft':
2074              case 'cats_post!deprecated':
2075              case 'cats_post!redirected':
2076              case 'cats_page':
2077              case 'cats_intro':
2078              case 'cats_podcast':
2079              case 'cats_sidebar':
2080                  // Category permissions...
2081                  if( ! is_array( $perm_target ) )
2082                  {    // We need an array here:
2083                      $perm_target = array( $perm_target );
2084                  }
2085  
2086                  // First we need to create an array of blogs, not cats
2087                  $perm_target_blogs = array();
2088                  foreach( $perm_target as $loop_cat_ID )
2089                  {
2090                      $loop_cat_blog_ID = get_catblog( $loop_cat_ID );
2091                      // echo "cat $loop_cat_ID -> blog $loop_cat_blog_ID <br />";
2092                      if( ! in_array( $loop_cat_blog_ID, $perm_target_blogs ) )
2093                      { // not already in list: add it:
2094                          $perm_target_blogs[] = $loop_cat_blog_ID;
2095                      }
2096                  }
2097  
2098                  $perm = true; // Permission granted if no blog denies it below
2099                  $blogperm = 'blog_'.substr( $permname, 5 );
2100                  // Now we'll check permissions for each blog:
2101                  foreach( $perm_target_blogs as $loop_blog_ID )
2102                  {
2103                      if( ! $this->check_perm( $blogperm, $permlevel, false, $loop_blog_ID ) )
2104                      { // If at least one blog denies the permission:
2105                          $perm = false;
2106                          break;
2107                      }
2108                  }
2109                  break;
2110  
2111              case 'recycle_owncmts':
2112                  // Check permission to edit comments for own items
2113                  $Comment = & $perm_target;
2114                  $Item = & $Comment->get_Item();
2115                  $blog_ID = $Item->get_blog_ID();
2116                  if( $Item->creator_user_ID == $this->ID )
2117                  { // Current user is owner of this item
2118                      if( $Item->is_locked() && !$this->check_perm( 'blog_cats', 'edit', false, $blog_ID ) )
2119                      { // Comment item is locked and current user is not allowed to edit locked items comment
2120                          break;
2121                      }
2122  
2123                      $comment_author_User = & $Comment->get_author_User();
2124                      if( ( empty( $comment_author_User ) || ( $comment_author_User->level <= $this->level ) )
2125                          && in_array( $Comment->status, array( 'published', 'community', 'protected' ) ) )
2126                      { // Comment author is anonymous or his level is lower than current User level, and the Comment was published with some of the above statuses
2127                          // Check blog user perms to see if user may recycle his own posts comments
2128                          $perm = $this->check_perm_blogusers( 'blog_recycle_owncmts', $permlevel, $blog_ID );
2129                          if( ! $perm )
2130                          { // Check groups for permissions to this specific blog:
2131                              $perm = $this->Group->check_perm_bloggroups( 'blog_recycle_owncmts', $permlevel, $blog_ID );
2132                          }
2133                      }
2134                  }
2135                  break;
2136  
2137              case 'blog_ismember':
2138              case 'blog_can_be_assignee':
2139              case 'blog_post_statuses':
2140              case 'blog_post!published':
2141              case 'blog_post!community':
2142              case 'blog_post!protected':
2143              case 'blog_post!private':
2144              case 'blog_post!review':
2145              case 'blog_post!draft':
2146              case 'blog_post!deprecated':
2147              case 'blog_post!redirected':
2148              case 'blog_del_post':
2149              case 'blog_edit':
2150              case 'blog_edit_cmt':
2151              case 'blog_comments':
2152              case 'blog_comment_statuses':
2153              case 'blog_del_cmts':
2154              case 'blog_vote_spam_comments':
2155              case 'blog_comment!published':
2156              case 'blog_comment!community':
2157              case 'blog_comment!protected':
2158              case 'blog_comment!private':
2159              case 'blog_comment!deprecated':
2160              case 'blog_comment!review':
2161              case 'blog_comment!draft':
2162              case 'blog_properties':
2163              case 'blog_cats':
2164              case 'blog_page':
2165              case 'blog_intro':
2166              case 'blog_podcast':
2167              case 'blog_sidebar':
2168              case 'blog_edit_ts':
2169                  // Blog permission to edit its properties...
2170                  if( $this->check_perm_blogowner( $perm_target_ID ) )
2171                  {    // Owner can do *almost* anything:
2172                      $perm = true;
2173                      break;
2174                  }
2175                  /* continue */
2176              case 'blog_admin': // This is what the owner does not have access to!
2177  
2178                  // Group may grant VIEW access, FULL access:
2179                  $this->get_Group();
2180                  $group_permlevel = ( $permlevel == 'view' ||  $permlevel == 'any' ) ? $permlevel : 'editall';
2181                  if( $this->Group->check_perm( 'blogs', $group_permlevel ) )
2182                  { // If group grants a global permission:
2183                      $perm = true;
2184                      break;
2185                  }
2186  
2187                  if( $perm_target_ID > 0 )
2188                  { // Check user perm for this blog:
2189                      $perm = $this->check_perm_blogusers( $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target_ID );
2190                      if( ! $perm )
2191                      { // Check groups for permissions to this specific blog:
2192                          $perm = $this->Group->check_perm_bloggroups( $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target_ID );
2193                      }
2194                  }
2195  
2196                  break;
2197  
2198              case 'comment!CURSTATUS':
2199                  /**
2200                   * @var Comment
2201                   */
2202                  $Comment = & $perm_target;
2203                  // Change the permname to one of the following:
2204                  $permname = 'comment!'.$Comment->status;
2205              case 'comment!published':
2206              case 'comment!community':
2207              case 'comment!protected':
2208              case 'comment!private':
2209              case 'comment!review':
2210              case 'comment!draft':
2211              case 'comment!deprecated':
2212              case 'comment!trash':
2213                  /**
2214                   * @var Comment
2215                   */
2216                  $Comment = & $perm_target;
2217                  $Item = & $Comment->get_Item();
2218                  $blog_ID = $Item->get_blog_ID();
2219                  $check_status = substr( $permname, 8 );
2220  
2221                  if( ( $permlevel != 'view' ) &&  $Item->is_locked() && !$this->check_perm( 'blog_cats', 'edit', false, $blog_ID ) )
2222                  { // Comment item is locked and current user is not allowed to edit/moderate locked items comment
2223                      break;
2224                  }
2225  
2226                  if( $this->check_perm_blog_global( $blog_ID, $permlevel ) )
2227                  { // User has global permission on this blog:
2228                      $perm = true;
2229                      break;
2230                  }
2231  
2232                  if( $Comment->status == 'trash' )
2233                  { // only global group 'editall' perm can give rights to 'trash' status, but this is not the case
2234                      break;
2235                  }
2236  
2237                  if( $permlevel == 'delete' )
2238                  { // permlevel is delete so we have to check the 'blog_del_cmts' permission
2239                      $perm = $this->check_perm( 'blog_del_cmts', 'edit', false, $blog_ID )
2240                              || $this->check_perm( 'recycle_owncmts', $permlevel, false, $Comment );
2241                      break;
2242                  }
2243  
2244                  // Check comment current status permissions at the blog level:
2245                  $blog_permname = 'blog_comment!'.$Comment->status;
2246                  $perm = $perm || $this->check_perm_blogusers( $blog_permname, $permlevel, $blog_ID, $Comment );
2247                  if( ! $perm )
2248                  { // Check groups for permissions to this specific blog:
2249                      $perm = $this->Group->check_perm_bloggroups( $blog_permname, $permlevel, $blog_ID, $Comment, $this );
2250                  }
2251                  if( $perm && ( $Comment->status != $check_status ) )
2252                  { // also check the requested status permissions at the blog level
2253                      $blog_permname = 'blog_comment!'.$check_status;
2254                      $perm = $this->check_perm_blogusers( $blog_permname, 'create', $blog_ID );
2255                      if( ! $perm )
2256                      { // Check groups for permissions to this specific blog:
2257                          $perm = $this->Group->check_perm_bloggroups( $blog_permname, 'create', $blog_ID );
2258                      }
2259                  }
2260                  break;
2261  
2262              case 'item_post!CURSTATUS':
2263                  /**
2264                   * @var Item
2265                   */
2266                  $Item = & $perm_target;
2267                  // Change the permname to one of the following:
2268                  $permname = 'item_post!'.$Item->status;
2269              case 'item_post!published':
2270              case 'item_post!community':
2271              case 'item_post!protected':
2272              case 'item_post!private':
2273              case 'item_post!review':
2274              case 'item_post!draft':
2275              case 'item_post!deprecated':
2276              case 'item_post!redirected':
2277                  // Get the Blog ID
2278                  /**
2279                   * @var Item
2280                   */
2281                  $Item = & $perm_target;
2282                  $blog_ID = $Item->get_blog_ID();
2283                  $check_status = substr( $permname, 10 );
2284  
2285                  if( ( $permlevel != 'view' ) && $Item->is_locked() && !$this->check_perm( 'blog_cats', 'edit', false, $blog_ID ) )
2286                  { // Item is locked and current user is not allowed to edit locked items ( only view permission is allowed by default for locked items )
2287                      break;
2288                  }
2289  
2290                  if( $this->check_perm_blog_global( $blog_ID, $permlevel ) )
2291                  { // User has global permission on this blog:
2292                      $perm = true;
2293                      break;
2294                  }
2295  
2296                  if( $permlevel == 'delete' )
2297                  { // permlevel is delete so we have to check the 'blog_del_post' permission
2298                      $perm = $this->check_perm( 'blog_del_post', 'edit', false, $blog_ID );
2299                      break;
2300                  }
2301  
2302                  // Check permissions at the blog level:
2303                  $blog_permname = 'blog_post!'.$Item->status;
2304                  $perm = $this->check_perm_blogusers( $blog_permname, $permlevel, $blog_ID, $Item );
2305                  if( ! $perm )

2307                      $perm = $this->Group->check_perm_bloggroups( $blog_permname, $permlevel, $blog_ID, $Item, $this );

2310                  { // also check the requested status permissions at the blog level
2311                      $blog_permname = 'blog_post!'.$check_status;
2312                      $perm = $this->check_perm_blogusers( $blog_permname, 'create', $blog_ID );
2313                      if( ! $perm )
2314                      { // Check groups for permissions to this specific blog:
2315                          $perm = $this->Group->check_perm_bloggroups( $blog_permname, 'create', $blog_ID );
2316                      }
2317                  }
2318                  break;
2319  
2320              case 'stats':
2321                  // Blog permission to edit its properties...

2323

2325                  if( $this->Group->check_perm( $permname, $permlevel ) )
2326                  { // If group grants a global permission:
2327                      $perm = true;
2328                      break;
2329                  }
2330  
2331                  if( $perm_target > 0 )
2332                  { // Check user perm for this blog:
2333                      $perm = $this->check_perm_blogusers( $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target );
2334                      if ( ! $perm )
2335                      { // Check groups for permissions to this specific blog:
2336                          $perm = $this->Group->check_perm_bloggroups( $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target );
2337                      }
2338                  }
2339                  break;
2340  
2341              case 'user':

2345                  { // User can't even view the edited User
2346                      break;
2347                  }
2348  
2349                  // If user has global permission on all users then everything is allowed
2350                  if( $this->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )

2352                      $perm = true;
2353                      break;

2363                      // this User has no permission to even view the target user
2364                      break;
2365                  }
2366  
2367                  // Note: With this implementation only admin users are allowed to view users from different countries when cross country browsing is restricted
2368                  // check if user has permission to moderate another user
2369                  if( ( $permlevel == 'moderate' ) && $this->check_perm( 'users', 'moderate' ) )
2370                  { // this user has moderator permission, check if the group level is higher then the target user group level
2371                      $this->get_Group();
2372                      $User->get_Group;
2373                      $perm = ( $this->Group->level > $User->Group->level );
2374                      break;
2375                  }
2376  
2377                  // Only 'view' permlevel remained, and this user is allowed to view the target user
2378                  $perm = true;
2379                  break;
2380  
2381              // asimo> edit_timestamp permission was converted to blog_edit_ts permission
2382  
2383  
2384              // asimo> files permission was converted to pluggable permission
2385              /*case 'files':
2386                  $this->get_Group();
2387                  $perm = $this->Group->check_perm( $permname, $permlevel );*/
2388  
2389                  /* Notes:
2390                   *  - $perm_target can be:
2391                   *    - NULL or 0: check global group permission only
2392                   *    - positive: check global group permission and
2393                   *      (if granted) if a specific blog denies it.
2394  * fp> This is BAD BAD BAD because it's inconsistent with the other permissions
2395  * in b2evolution. There should NEVER be a denying. ony additional allowing.
2396  * It's also inconsistent with most other permission systems.
2397  * The lower file permission level for groups is now called "No Access"
2398  * This should be renamed to "Depending on each blog's permissions"
2399  * Whatever general permissions you have on files, blog can give you additional permissions
2400  * but they can never take a global perm away.
2401  * Tblue> On the permissions page it says that the blog perms will be restricted
2402  * by any global perms, which means to me that a blog cannot grant e. g.
2403  * the files upload perm if this perm isn't granted globally... But apparently
2404  * it shouldn't be like that?! I understand it should be like that then:
2405  * if( ! $perm && $perm_target && in_array( $permlevel, array( 'add', 'view', 'edit' ) )
2406  * {
2407  *         // check if blog grants permission.
2408  * }
2409  * If this is correct, we should remove the note on the blog permissions
2410  * pages and the group properties form.
2411  * fp> ok, I had forgotten we had that old message, but still it doesn't say it will, it says it *may* !
2412  * To be exact the message should be "
2413  * Note: General group permissions may further restrict or extend any permissions defined here."
2414  * Restriction should only happen when "NO ACCESS" is selected
2415  * But when "Depending on each blog's permissions" is selected, THEN (and I guess ONLY then) the blog permissions should be used
2416  * Note: This is quite messy actually. maybe it would make more sense to separate group permissions by "root type":
2417  * i-e nto use the same permission for blog roots vs user root vs shared root vs skins root
2418  * what do you think?
2419  * Tblue> That sounds OK. So we would add another option to the global
2420  * 'files' group perm setting ("Depending on each blog's permissions"), right?
2421  * fp> yes.
2422  * tb> Regarding separation: It could make sense. The blog-specific permissions would only
2423  * affect blog roots (and if "Depending on each blog's permissions" is selected;
2424  * for the other roots we would add separate (global) settings...
2425  * fp> yes.
2426                   *  - Only a $permlevel of 'add', 'view' or 'edit' can be
2427                   *    denied by blog permissions.
2428                   *  - If the group grants the 'all' permission, blogs cannot
2429                   *    deny it.
2430                   */
2431  /*
2432                  if( $perm && $perm_target && in_array( $permlevel, array( 'add', 'view', 'edit' ) )
2433                      && $this->Group->get( 'perm_files' ) != 'all' )

2435                      $perm = $this->check_perm_blogusers( $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target );
2436                      if ( ! $perm )
2437                      { // Check groups for permissions for this specific blog:

2442                  //break;
2443  
2444              default:
2445                  // Check pluggable permissions using user permission check function
2446                  $this->get_Group();
2447                  $perm = Module::check_perm( $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target, 'user_func', $this->Group );
2448                  if( $perm === true || $perm === NULL )
2449                  { // If user_func or user perm not exists in the corresponding module then $perm value will be NULL and we have to check the group permission.
2450                      // If user_func exists and returns true, then we have to check group permission to make sure it does not restrict the user perm.
2451  
2452                      // Other global permissions (see if the group can handle them).
2453                      // Forward request to group:
2454                      $perm = $this->Group->check_perm( $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target );
2455                  }
2456          }
2457  
2458          if( is_object($perm_target) )
2459          {    // Prevent catchable E_FATAL with PHP 5.2 (because there's no __tostring for e.g. Item)
2460              $taget_name = get_class($perm_target).'('.$perm_target_ID.')';
2461          }
2462          elseif( is_array($perm_target) )
2463          {    // Convert to ID list
2464              $taget_name = '('.implode(',', $perm_target).')';
2465          }
2466          else
2467          {
2468              $taget_name = $perm_target;
2469          }
2470  
2471          $Debuglog->add( 'User perm '.$permname.':'.$permlevel.':'.$taget_name.' => '.($perm ? 'granted' : 'DENIED'), 'perms' );
2472  
2473          if( ! $perm && $assert )
2474          { // We can't let this go on!
2475              global $app_name;
2476              debug_die( sprintf( /* %s is the application name, usually "b2evolution" */ T_('Group/user permission denied by %s!'), $app_name )." ($permname:$permlevel:".( is_object( $perm_target ) ? get_class( $perm_target ).'('.$perm_target_ID.')' : $perm_target ).")" );
2477          }
2478  
2479          if( isset($perm_target_ID) )
2480          {
2481              // echo "cache_perms[$permname][$permlevel][$perm_target] = $perm;";
2482              $this->cache_perms[$permname][$permlevel][$perm_target_ID] = $perm;
2483          }
2484  
2485          return $perm;
2486      }

2489      /**
2490       * Check if the user is the owner of the designated blog (which gives him a lot of permissions)
2491       *
2492       * @param integer
2493       * @return boolean
2494       */
2495  	function check_perm_blogowner( $blog_ID )
2496      {
2497          if( empty( $blog_ID ) )
2498          {
2499              return false;
2500          }
2501  
2502          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
2503          /**
2504           * @var Blog
2505           */
2506          $Blog = & $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog_ID );
2507  
2508          return ( $Blog->owner_user_ID == $this->ID );
2509      }
2510  
2511  
2512      /**
2513       * Check if the user is the owner of the designated item (which gives him a lot of permissions)
2514       *
2515       * @param integer
2516       * @return boolean
2517       */
2518  	function check_perm_itemowner( $item_ID )
2519      {
2520          if( empty( $item_ID ) )
2521          {
2522              return false;
2523          }
2524  
2525          $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache();
2526          /**
2527           * @var Item
2528           */
2529          $Item = & $ItemCache->get_by_ID( $item_ID );
2530  
2531          return ( $Item->creator_user_ID == $this->ID );
2532      }

2535      /**
2536       * Check if user has global perms on this blog
2537       *
2538       * @param integer blog ID
2539       * @param string permlevel
2540       * @return boolean true if user is the owner, or user group has some permission on all blogs
2541       */
2542  	function check_perm_blog_global( $blog_ID, $permlevel = 'edit' )
2543      {
2544          if( $this->check_perm_blogowner( $blog_ID ) )
2545          { // user is the blog owner
2546              return true;
2547          }
2548  
2549          // Group may grant VIEW access, FULL access:
2550          $this->get_Group();
2551          $group_permlevel = ( $permlevel == 'view' && $permlevel == 'any' ) ? 'viewall' : 'editall';
2552          if( $this->Group->check_perm( 'blogs', $group_permlevel ) )
2553          { // If group grants a global permission:
2554              return true;
2555          }
2556  
2557          return false;
2558      }

2561      /**
2562       * Check permission for this user on a specified blog
2563       *
2564       * This is not for direct use, please call {@link User::check_perm()} instead
2565       *
2566       * @see User::check_perm()
2567       * @param string Permission name, can be one of the following:
2568       *                  - blog_ismember
2569       *                  - blog_can_be_assignee
2570       *                  - blog_post_statuses
2571       *                  - blog_del_post
2572       *                  - blog_edit_ts
2573       *                  - blog_comments
2574       *                  - blog_cats
2575       *                  - blog_properties
2576       * @param string Permission level
2577       * @param integer Permission target blog ID
2578       * @param Item Item that we want to edit
2579       * @return boolean 0 if permission denied
2580       */
2581  	function check_perm_blogusers( $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target_blog, $perm_target = NULL )
2582      {
2583          // Check if user blog advanced perms are loaded
2584          if( ! isset( $this->blog_post_statuses[$perm_target_blog] ) )
2585          { // Blog post statuses have not been loaded yet:
2586              $this->blog_post_statuses[$perm_target_blog] = array();
2587              if( ! load_blog_advanced_perms( $this->blog_post_statuses[$perm_target_blog], $perm_target_blog, $this->ID, 'bloguser' ) )
2588              { // Could not load blog advanced user perms
2589                  return false;
2590              }
2591          }
2592  
2593          // Check permission and return the result
2594          return check_blog_advanced_perm( $this->blog_post_statuses[$perm_target_blog], $this->ID, $permname, $permlevel, $perm_target );
2595      }

2598      /**
2599       * Check if user status permit the give action
2600       *
2601       * @param string action
2602       * @param integger target ID - can be a post ID, user ID
2603       * @return boolean true if the action is permitted, false otherwise
2604       */
2605  	function check_status( $action, $target = NULL )
2606      {
2607          global $Settings, $Blog;
2608  
2609          switch( $action )
2610          {
2611              case 'can_view_user':
2612                  if( $Settings->get( 'allow_anonymous_user_profiles' ) || ( !empty( $target ) && ( $target == $this->ID ) ) )
2613                  { // even anonymous users can see users profile, or user wants to check his own profile
2614                      return true;
2615                  }
2616                  return ( ( $this->status == 'activated' ) || ( $this->status == 'autoactivated' ) );
2617              case 'can_view_users':
2618                  if( $Settings->get( 'allow_anonymous_user_list' ) )
2619                  { // even anonymous users can see users list
2620                      return true;
2621                  }
2622                  return ( ( $this->status == 'activated' ) || ( $this->status == 'autoactivated' ) );
2623              case 'can_view_comments':
2624              case 'can_view_contacts':
2625              case 'can_view_messages':
2626              case 'can_view_threads':
2627              case 'is_validated':
2628              case 'can_access_admin':
2629              case 'can_edit_post':
2630              case 'can_edit_comment':
2631              case 'can_edit_contacts':
2632              case 'can_report_user':
2633                  return ( ( $this->status == 'activated' ) || ( $this->status == 'autoactivated' ) );
2634              case 'can_be_validated':
2635                  return ( ( $this->status == 'new' ) || ( $this->status == 'emailchanged' ) || ( $this->status == 'deactivated' ) || ( $this->status == 'failedactivation' ) );
2636              case 'can_view_msgform':
2637              case 'can_receive_any_message': // can this user receive emails or private messages
2638              case 'can_receive_pm':
2639              case 'can_display_avatar': // can display user's avatar for not admin users
2640              case 'can_display_link': // can display user's profile link for not admin users
2641                  return ( $this->status != 'closed' );
2642              case 'is_closed':
2643                  return ( $this->status == 'closed' );
2644              default:
2645                  debug_die( 'This action is not handled during status check!' );
2646          }
2647      }
2648  
2649      /**
2650       * Check if the user has the given role in any blog
2651       *
2652       * @param string role name, available values ( post_owner, moderator )
2653       * @return mixed NULL if the given roll name is not defined or there are no blogs, true if the user is super admin, 0 if the user doesn't have the given role, positive number otherwise
2654       */
2655  	function check_role( $rolename )
2656      {
2657          global $DB;
2658  
2659          if( $this->check_perm( 'blogs', 'editall' ) )
2660          { // if user has global editall blogs permission then it has any kind of role in all blogs
2661              return true;
2662          }
2663  
2664          switch( $rolename )
2665          {
2666              case 'post_owner':
2667                  // User is considerated as a post owner, if already has at least one post, or he has right to create posts
2668                  if( $this->get_num_posts() > 0 )
2669                  { // User already has at least one post
2670                      return true;
2671                  }
2672                  $role_conditions = array( 'perm_poststatuses' => array( 'IS NOT NULL', '<> ""' ) );
2673                  break;
2674  
2675              case 'member':
2676                  // User has member role if is member of at least one blog
2677                  $role_conditions = array( 'ismember' => array( 'IS NOT NULL', '<> 0' ) );
2678                  break;
2679  
2680              case 'comment_editor':
2681                  // User has permission to edit some other users comments at least in one status
2682                  $role_conditions = array(
2683                      'perm_edit_cmt' => array( 'IS NOT NULL', '<> "no"', '<> "own"' ),
2684                      'perm_cmtstatuses' => array( 'IS NOT NULL', '<> 0' )
2685                  );
2686                  break;
2687  
2688              case 'comment_moderator':
2689                  // set comment moderator perm names
2690                  $edit_perm_name = 'perm_edit_cmt';
2691                  $statuses_perm_name = 'perm_cmtstatuses';
2692              case 'post_moderator':
2693                  if( $rolename == 'post_moderator' )
2694                  { // set post moderator perm names
2695                      $edit_perm_name = 'perm_edit';
2696                      $statuses_perm_name = 'perm_poststatuses';
2697                  }
2698  
2699                  // A moderator must have permissions to create post/comment with at least two statuses from moderation statuses + published status
2700                  $check_statuses = get_visibility_statuses( 'moderation' );
2701                  // Create addition of statuses perm values
2702                  $perms_value = get_status_permvalue( 'published' );
2703                  foreach( $check_statuses as $status )
2704                  {
2705                      $perms_value = $perms_value + get_status_permvalue( $status );
2706                  }
2707  
2708                  // Check if user has permission to edit other comments than his own and has create permission on at least two statuses defined above
2709                  $role_conditions = array(
2710                      $edit_perm_name => array( 'IS NOT NULL', '<> "no"', '<> "own"' ),
2711                      $statuses_perm_name => array( 'IS NOT NULL', 'BIT_COUNT( $perm_field$ & '.$perms_value.' ) > 1' )
2712                  );
2713                  break;
2714  
2715              default: // roll with the given roll name is not defined
2716                  return NULL;
2717          }
2718  
2719          $where_clause = '';
2720          $perm_prefixes = array( 'bloguser_', 'bloggroup_' );
2721          foreach( $perm_prefixes as $prefix )
2722          { // Check requred perms on blogusers and bloggroups as well
2723              $where_part = '';
2724              foreach( $role_conditions as $perm_name => $conditions )
2725              { // Go through each required permission
2726                  $perm_field = $prefix.$perm_name;
2727                  foreach( $conditions as $condition )
2728                  { // Check all defined conditions and join with 'AND' operator
2729                      if( strpos( $condition, '$perm_field$' ) !== false )
2730                      { // The $perm_filed must be replaced in the middle of the condition
2731                          $where_part .= '( '.str_replace( '$perm_field$', $perm_field, $condition ).' ) AND ';
2732                      }
2733                      else
2734                      { // The $perm_filed must be added into the beginning of the condition
2735                          $where_part .= '( '.$perm_field.' '.$condition.' ) AND ';
2736                      }
2737                  }
2738              }
2739              // Remove the last ' AND ' from the end of this where clause part
2740              $where_part = substr( $where_part, 0, strlen( $where_part ) - 5 );
2741              // Add the created conditions to the final where clause
2742              $where_clause .= '( '.$where_part.' )';
2743              if( $prefix != 'bloggroup_' )
2744              { // 'bloggroup_' perm check is the last, but everywhere else we need an 'OR' operator
2745                  $where_clause .= ' OR ';
2746              }
2747          }
2748  
2749          // Count blog ids where this user has the required permissions for the given role
2750          $SQL = new SQL();
2751          $SQL->SELECT( 'count( blog_ID )' );
2752          $SQL->FROM( 'T_blogs' );
2753          $SQL->FROM_add( 'LEFT JOIN T_coll_user_perms ON (blog_advanced_perms <> 0 AND blog_ID = bloguser_blog_ID AND bloguser_user_ID = '.$this->ID.' )' );
2754          $SQL->FROM_add( 'LEFT JOIN T_coll_group_perms ON (blog_advanced_perms <> 0 AND blog_ID = bloggroup_blog_ID AND bloggroup_group_ID = '.$this->grp_ID.' )' );
2755          $SQL->WHERE( 'blog_owner_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
2756          $SQL->WHERE_or( $where_clause );
2757  
2758          return $DB->get_var( $SQL->get(), 0, NULL, 'Check user role in all blogs' );
2759      }

2762      /**
2763       * Check if this user and his group accept receiving private messages or not
2764       *
2765       * @return boolean
2766       */
2767  	function accepts_pm()
2768      {
2769          global $UserSettings;
2770          return ( $UserSettings->get( 'enable_PM', $this->ID ) && $this->check_perm( 'perm_messaging', 'reply' ) );
2771      }

2774      /**
2775       * Check if this user accepts receiving emails and has an email address
2776       *
2777       * @return boolean
2778       */
2779  	function accepts_email()
2780      {
2781          global $UserSettings, $Settings;
2782          return ( $Settings->get( 'emails_msgform') != 'never' ) && ( $UserSettings->get( 'enable_email', $this->ID ) ) && ( ! empty( $this->email ) );
2783      }

2785  
2786      /**
2787       * Get messaging possibilities between current user and this user
2788       *
2789       * @return NULL|string allowed messaging possibility: PM > email > login > NULL
2790       */
2791  	function get_msgform_possibility( $current_User = NULL )
2792      {
2793          if( ! $this->check_status( 'can_receive_any_message' ) )
2794          { // there is no way to send a message to a user with closed account
2795              return NULL;
2796          }
2797  
2798          if( is_logged_in() )
2799          { // current User is a registered user
2800              if( $current_User == NULL )
2801              {
2802                  global $current_User;
2803              }
2804              if( has_cross_country_restriction( 'contact' ) && ( empty( $current_User->ctry_ID ) || ( $current_User->ctry_ID !== $this->ctry_ID ) ) )
2805              { // Contat to this user is not enabled
2806                  return NULL;
2807              }
2808              if( $this->accepts_pm() && $current_User->accepts_pm() && ( $this->ID != $current_User->ID ) )
2809              { // both user has permission to send or receive private message and not the same user
2810                  // check if current_User is allowed to create a new conversation with this user.
2811                  $blocked_contact = check_blocked_contacts( array( $this->ID ) );
2812                  if( empty( $blocked_contact ) )
2813                  { // user is allowed to send pm to this user, and he didn't reached his new thread limit yet
2814                      return 'PM';
2815                  }
2816              }
2817              if( $this->accepts_email() )
2818              { // this user allows email => send email
2819                  return 'email';
2820              }
2821          }
2822          else
2823          { // current User is not logged in
2824              if( $this->accepts_email() )
2825              { // this user allows email
2826                  return 'email';
2827              }
2828              if( $this->accepts_pm() )
2829              { // no email option try to log in and send private message (just registered users can send PM)
2830                  return 'login';
2831              }
2832          }
2833          // no messaging option between current_User and this user
2834          return NULL;
2835      }
2836  
2837  
2838      /**
2839       * Get the reason why current User is not able to make a contact with this User
2840       *
2841       * This is used when get_msgform_possibility returns NULL;
2842       *
2843       * @return string
2844       */
2845  	function get_no_msgform_reason()
2846      {
2847          global $current_User;
2848  
2849          if( ( is_logged_in() ) && $this->accepts_pm() )
2850          {
2851              if( has_cross_country_restriction( 'contact' ) && ( empty( $current_User->ctry_ID ) || ( $current_User->ctry_ID !== $this->ctry_ID ) ) )
2852              { // Contat to this user is not enabled
2853                  return T_( 'You are not allowed to contact with this user.' );
2854              }
2855              if( $current_User->accepts_pm() )
2856              { // current User accepts private messages
2857                  if( $current_User->ID == $this->ID )
2858                  { // current User and recipient user are the same
2859                      return T_( 'You cannot send a private message to yourself.' );
2860                  }
2861                  // current User is not able to contact with this User because User has blocked current User or current User is not in this users contact list
2862                  return T_( 'This user can only be contacted through private messages, but you are not allowed to send private message to this user.' );
2863              }
2864              // current User has no messaging permission or has disabled private messages in user preferences
2865              return T_( 'This user can only be contacted through private messages but you are not allowed to send any private messages.' );
2866          }
2867          // current User is not logged in or this User doesn't want to be contacted
2868          return T_( 'This user does not wish to be contacted directly.' );
2869      }

2872      /**
2873       * Insert object into DB based on previously recorded changes
2874       *
2875       * Triggers the plugin event AfterUserInsert.
2876       *
2877       * @param boolean TRUE to automatically create new blog if group has permission
2878       * @return boolean true on success
2879       */
2880  	function dbinsert( $create_auto_blog = true )
2881      {
2882          global $Plugins, $DB;
2883  
2884          $DB->begin();
2885  
2886          if( $result = parent::dbinsert() )
2887          { // We could insert the user object..
2888  
2889              // Add new fields:
2890              if( !empty($this->new_fields) )
2891              {
2892                  $sql = 'INSERT INTO T_users__fields( uf_user_ID, uf_ufdf_ID, uf_varchar )
2893                                  VALUES ('.$this->ID.', '.implode( '), ('.$this->ID.', ', $this->new_fields ).' )';
2894                  $DB->query( $sql, 'Insert new fields' );
2895                  // Reset new fields in object:
2896                  $this->new_fields = array();
2897              }
2898  
2899              // Notify plugins:
2900              // A user could be created also in another DB (to synchronize it with b2evo)
2901              $Plugins->trigger_event( 'AfterUserInsert', $params = array( 'User' => & $this ) );
2902  
2903              $Group = & $this->get_Group();
2904              if( $create_auto_blog && $Group->check_perm( 'perm_getblog', 'allowed' ) )
2905              { // automatically create new blog for this user
2906                  // TODO: sam2kb> Create a blog only when this user is validated!
2907                  $new_Blog = new Blog( NULL );
2908                  $shortname = $this->get( 'login' );
2909                  $new_Blog->set( 'owner_user_ID', $this->ID );
2910                  $new_Blog->set( 'shortname', $shortname );
2911                  $new_Blog->set( 'name', $shortname.'\'s blog' );
2912                  $new_Blog->set( 'locale', $this->get( 'locale' ));
2913                  $new_Blog->set( 'urlname', urltitle_validate( $shortname, $shortname, $new_Blog->ID, false, 'blog_urlname', 'blog_ID', 'T_blogs', $this->get( 'locale' ) ) );
2914  
2915                  // Defines blog settings by its kind.
2916                  $Plugins->trigger_event( 'InitCollectionKinds', array(
2917                                  'Blog' => & $new_Blog,
2918                                  'kind' => 'std',
2919                              ) );
2920  
2921                  $new_Blog->create();
2922              }
2923  
2924              // Save IP Range and user counter
2925              antispam_increase_counter( 'user' );
2926          }
2927  
2928          $DB->commit();
2929  
2930          return $result;
2931      }

2933  
2934      /**
2935       * Update the DB based on previously recorded changes.
2936       *
2937       * Triggers the plugin event AfterUserUpdate.
2938       */
2939  	function dbupdate()
2940      {
2941          global $DB, $Plugins, $current_User, $localtimenow;
2942  
2943          $DB->begin();
2944  
2945          $result = parent::dbupdate();
2946  
2947          // Update existing fields:
2948          if( !empty($this->updated_fields) )
2949          {
2950              foreach( $this->updated_fields as $uf_ID => $uf_val )
2951              {
2952                  // Note the updated_fields key values must be integers, so don't need casting or DB->quote()
2953                  if( empty( $uf_val ) )
2954                  {    // Delete field:
2955                      $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_users__fields
2956                                                           WHERE uf_ID = '.$uf_ID );
2957                  }
2958                  else
2959                  {    // Update field:
2960                      $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_users__fields
2961                                                      SET uf_varchar = '.$DB->quote( $uf_val ).'
2962                                                  WHERE uf_ID = '.$uf_ID );
2963                  }
2964              }
2965              // Reset updated fields in object:
2966              $this->updated_fields = array();
2967          }
2968  
2969          // Add new fields:
2970          if( !empty($this->new_fields) )
2971          {
2972              $sql = 'INSERT INTO T_users__fields( uf_user_ID, uf_ufdf_ID, uf_varchar )
2973                              VALUES ('.$this->ID.', '.implode( '), ('.$this->ID.', ', $this->new_fields ).' )';
2974              $DB->query( $sql, 'Insert new fields' );
2975              // Reset new fields in object:
2976              $this->new_fields = array();
2977          }
2978  
2979          // Notify plugins:
2980          // Example: An authentication plugin could synchronize/update the password of the user.
2981          $Plugins->trigger_event( 'AfterUserUpdate', $params = array( 'User' => & $this ) );
2982  
2983          $DB->commit();
2984  
2985          if( $result === true && count( $this->significant_changed_values ) > 0 )
2986          { // Send notification email about the changes of user account
2987              $this->send_account_changed_notification();
2988          }
2989  
2990          // BLOCK CACHE INVALIDATION:
2991          // This User has been modified, cached content depending on it should be invalidated:
2992          BlockCache::invalidate_key( 'user_ID', $this->ID );
2993  
2994          return true;
2995      }

2998      /**
2999       * Delete user and dependencies from database
3000       *
3001       * Includes WAY TOO MANY requests because we try to be compatible with MySQL 3.23, bleh!
3002       *
3003       * @param Log Log object where output gets added (by reference).
3004       */
3005  	function dbdelete( & $Log )
3006      {
3007          global $DB, $Plugins;
3008  
3009          if( $this->ID == 0 ) debug_die( 'Non persistant object cannot be deleted!' );
3010  
3011          $deltype = param( 'deltype', 'string', '' ); // spammer
3012  
3013          $DB->begin();
3014  
3015          if( $deltype == 'spammer' )
3016          { // If we delete user as spammer we should delete private messaged of this user
3017              $this->delete_messages();
3018          }
3019          else
3020          { // If we delete user as not spammer we keep his comments as from anonymous user
3021              // Transform registered user comments to unregistered:
3022              $ret = $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_comments
3023                                                      SET comment_author_user_ID = NULL,
3024                                                              comment_author = '.$DB->quote( $this->get('preferredname') ).',
3025                                                              comment_author_email = '.$DB->quote( $this->get('email') ).',
3026                                                              comment_author_url = '.$DB->quote( $this->get('url') ).'
3027                                                      WHERE comment_author_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
3028              if( is_a( $Log, 'log' ) )
3029              {
3030                  $Log->add( 'Transforming user\'s comments to unregistered comments... '.sprintf( '(%d rows)', $ret ), 'note' );
3031              }
3032          }
3033  
3034          // Get list of posts that are going to be deleted (3.23)
3035          $post_list = implode( ',', $DB->get_col( '
3036                  SELECT post_ID
3037                    FROM T_items__item
3038                   WHERE post_creator_user_ID = '.$this->ID ) );
3039  
3040          if( !empty( $post_list ) )
3041          {
3042              // Delete comments
3043              $ret = $DB->query( "DELETE FROM T_comments
3044                                                      WHERE comment_item_ID IN ($post_list)" );
3045              if( is_a( $Log, 'log' ) )
3046              {
3047                  $Log->add( sprintf( 'Deleted %d comments on user\'s posts.', $ret ), 'note' );
3048              }
3049  
3050              // Delete post extracats
3051              $ret = $DB->query( "DELETE FROM T_postcats
3052                                                      WHERE postcat_post_ID IN ($post_list)" );
3053              if( is_a( $Log, 'log' ) )
3054              {
3055                  $Log->add( sprintf( 'Deleted %d extracats of user\'s posts\'.', $ret ) ); // TODO: geeky wording.
3056              }
3057  
3058              // Posts will we auto-deleted by parent method
3059          }
3060          else
3061          { // no posts
3062              if( is_a( $Log, 'log' ) )
3063              {
3064                  $Log->add( 'No posts to delete.', 'note' );
3065              }
3066          }
3067  
3068          // Get list of sessions that are going to be deleted
3069          $sessions_SQL = new SQL();
3070          $sessions_SQL->SELECT( 'sess_ID' );
3071          $sessions_SQL->FROM( 'T_sessions' );
3072          $sessions_SQL->WHERE( 'sess_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
3073          $sessions_list = $DB->get_col( $sessions_SQL->get() );
3074  
3075          if( !empty( $sessions_list ) )
3076          { // Delete all hit logs of this user
3077              $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_hitlog
3078                      WHERE hit_sess_ID IN ( '.$DB->quote( $sessions_list ).' )' );
3079          }
3080  
3081          // delete user involved ophan threads
3082          delete_orphan_threads( $this->ID );
3083  
3084          // Remove this user from posts where it was as last edit user
3085          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__item
3086                                      SET post_lastedit_user_ID = NULL
3087                                    WHERE post_lastedit_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
3088          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_items__version
3089                                      SET iver_edit_user_ID = NULL
3090                                    WHERE iver_edit_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
3091  
3092          // Remove this user from links where it was as last edit user
3093          $DB->query( 'UPDATE T_links
3094                                      SET link_lastedit_user_ID = NULL
3095                                    WHERE link_lastedit_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
3096  
3097          // remember ID, because parent method resets it to 0
3098          $old_ID = $this->ID;
3099          $old_email = $this->get( 'email' );
3100  
3101          // Delete main object:
3102          if( ! parent::dbdelete() )
3103          {
3104              $DB->rollback();
3105  
3106              $Log->add( 'User has not been deleted.', 'error' );
3107              return false;
3108          }
3109  
3110          // user was deleted, also delete this user's media folder recursively
3111          $FileRootCache = & get_FileRootCache();
3112          $root_directory = $FileRootCache->get_root_dir( 'user', $old_ID );
3113          rmdir_r( $root_directory );
3114  
3115          if( $deltype == 'spammer' )
3116          { // User was deleted as spammer, we should mark email of this user as 'Spammer'
3117              $EmailAddressCache = & get_EmailAddressCache();
3118              $EmailAddress = & $EmailAddressCache->get_by_name( $old_email, false, false );
3119              if( !$EmailAddress )
3120              {    // Create new record in the T_email_address table
3121                  $EmailAddress = new EmailAddress();
3122                  $EmailAddress->set( 'address', $old_email );
3123              }
3124              if( !empty( $EmailAddress ) )
3125              { // Save status of an email address
3126                  $EmailAddress->set( 'status', 'spammer' );
3127                  $EmailAddress->dbsave();
3128              }
3129          }
3130  
3131          $DB->commit();
3132  
3133          if( is_a( $Log, 'log' ) )
3134          {
3135              $Log->add( 'Deleted User.', 'note' );
3136          }
3137  
3138          // Notify plugins:
3139          $this->ID = $old_ID;
3140          $Plugins->trigger_event( 'AfterUserDelete', $params = array( 'User' => & $this ) );
3141          $this->ID = 0;
3142  
3143          // BLOCK CACHE INVALIDATION:
3144          // This User has been modified, cached content depending on it should be invalidated:
3145          BlockCache::invalidate_key( 'user_ID', $old_ID );
3146  
3147          return true;
3148      }

3151      /**
3152       * Send an email to the user with a link to validate/confirm his email address.
3153       *
3154       * If the email could get sent, it saves the used "request_id" into the user's Session.
3155       *
3156       * @param string URL, where to redirect the user after he clicked the validation link (gets saved in Session).
3157       * @return boolean True, if the email could get sent; false if not
3158       */
3159  	function send_validate_email( $redirect_to_after, $blog = NULL, $email_changed = false )
3160      {
3161          global $app_name, $Session, $secure_htsrv_url, $baseurl, $servertimenow;
3162          global $Settings, $UserSettings;
3163  
3164          // Display messages depending on user email status
3165          display_user_email_status_message( $this->ID );
3166  
3167          if( $Settings->get( 'validation_process' ) == 'easy' )
3168          { // validation process is set to easy, send and easy activation email
3169              return send_easy_validate_emails( array( $this->ID ), false, $email_changed );
3170          }
3171  
3172          if( mail_is_blocked( $this->email ) )
3173          { // prevent trying to send an email to a blocked email address ( Note this is checked in the send_easy_validate_emails too )
3174              return false;
3175          }
3176  
3177          if( empty( $redirect_to_after ) )
3178          { // redirect to was not set
3179              $redirect_to_after = param( 'redirect_to', 'url', '' );
3180              if( empty( $redirect_to_after ) )
3181              {
3182                  if( is_admin_page() )
3183                  {
3184                      $redirect_to_after = regenerate_url( 'action' );
3185                  }
3186                  else
3187                  {
3188                      $redirect_to_after = $this->get_userpage_url();
3189                  }
3190              }
3191          }
3192  
3193          $request_id = generate_random_key(22);
3194  
3195          $blog_param = ( empty( $blog ) ) ? '' : '&inskin=1&blog='.$blog;
3196  
3197          // Change locale here to localize the email subject and content
3198          locale_temp_switch( $this->get( 'locale' ) );
3199          $email_template_params = array(
3200                  'status'     => $this->status,
3201                  'blog_param' => $blog_param,
3202                  'request_id' => $request_id,
3203              );
3204          $r = send_mail_to_User( $this->ID, T_('Activate your account: $login$'), 'account_activate', $email_template_params, true );
3205          locale_restore_previous();
3206  
3207          if( $r )
3208          { // save request_id into Session
3209              $request_ids = $Session->get( 'core.validatemail.request_ids' );
3210              if( ( ! is_array($request_ids) ) || $email_changed )
3211              { // create new request ids array if it doesn't exist yet, or if user email changed ( this way the old request into the old email address won't be valid )
3212                  $request_ids = array();
3213              }
3214              $request_ids[] = $request_id;
3215              $Session->set( 'core.validatemail.request_ids', $request_ids, 86400 * 2 ); // expires in two days (or when clicked)
3216              // set a redirect_to session variable because this way after the account will be activated we will know where to redirect
3217              $Session->set( 'core.validatemail.redirect_to', $redirect_to_after  );
3218              $Session->dbsave(); // save immediately
3219  
3220              // update last activation email timestamp
3221              $UserSettings->set( 'last_activation_email', date2mysql( $servertimenow ), $this->ID );
3222              $UserSettings->dbupdate();
3223          }
3224  
3225          return $r;
3226      }

3229      /**
3230       * Activate user account after user clicks on activate link from email
3231       */
3232  	function activate_from_Request()
3233      {
3234          global $DB, $Settings, $UserSettings;
3235  
3236          // Activate current user account:
3237          $this->set( 'status', 'activated' );
3238          $this->dbupdate();
3239  
3240          // clear last reminder key and last activation email date because the user was activated
3241          $UserSettings->delete( 'last_activation_reminder_key', $this->ID );
3242          $UserSettings->delete( 'last_activation_email', $this->ID );
3243          $UserSettings->delete( 'activation_reminder_count', $this->ID );
3244          $UserSettings->delete( 'send_activation_reminder', $this->ID );
3245          $UserSettings->dbupdate();
3246  
3247          if( $Settings->get( 'newusers_findcomments' ) )
3248          {    // We have to assign the all old comments from current user by email
3249              $DB->query( '
3250                  UPDATE T_comments
3251                     SET comment_author_user_ID = "'.$this->ID.'"
3252                   WHERE comment_author_email = '.$DB->quote( $this->email ).'
3253                     AND comment_author_user_ID IS NULL' );
3254          }
3255  
3256          // Create a welcome private message when user's status was changed to Active
3257          $this->send_welcome_message();
3258  
3259          // Send notification email about activated account to users with edit users permission
3260          $email_template_params = array(
3261              'User' => $this,
3262              'login' => $this->login, // this is required in the send_admin_notification
3263          );
3264          send_admin_notification( NT_('New user account activated'), 'account_activated', $email_template_params );
3265      }

3290      /**
3291       * Template helper function: Get a link to a message form for this user.
3292       *
3293       * @param string url of the message form
3294       * @param string to display before link
3295       * @param string to display after link
3296       * @param string link text
3297       * @param string link title
3298       * @param string class name
3299       */
3300  	function get_msgform_link( $form_url = NULL, $before = ' ', $after = ' ', $text = '#', $title = '#', $class = '' )
3301      {
3302          if( empty($this->email) )
3303          { // We have no email for this User :(
3304              return false;
3305          }
3306  
3307          $available_msgform = $this->get_msgform_possibility();
3308          if( ! $available_msgform )
3309          {    // There is no way this user accepts receiving messages.
3310              return false;
3311          }
3312  
3313          if( is_null($form_url) )
3314          {
3315              global $Blog;
3316              $form_url = isset($Blog) ? $Blog->get('msgformurl') : '';
3317          }
3318  
3319          $form_url = url_add_param( $form_url, 'recipient_id='.$this->ID.'&amp;redirect_to='.rawurlencode(url_rel_to_same_host(regenerate_url('','','','&'), $form_url)) );
3320  
3321          if( $title == '#' )
3322          {
3323              switch( $available_msgform )
3324              {
3325                  case 'email':
3326                      $title = T_('Send email to user');
3327                      break;
3328                  case 'PM':
3329                  case 'login':
3330                  default:
3331                      $title = T_('Send message to user');
3332                      break;
3333              }
3334          }
3335          if( $text == '#' ) $text = get_icon( 'email', 'imgtag', array( 'class' => 'middle', 'title' => $title ) );
3336  
3337          $r = '';
3338          $r .= $before;
3339          $r .= '<a href="'.$form_url.'" title="'.$title.'"';
3340          if( !empty( $class ) )
3341          {
3342              $r .= ' class="'.$class.'"';
3343          }
3344          $r .= '>'.$text.'</a>';
3345          $r .= $after;
3346  
3347          return $r;
3348      }

3434       */
3435  	function get_gender()
3436      {
3437          switch( $this->gender )
3438          {
3439              case 'M':
3440                  return T_('A man');
3441  
3442              case 'F':
3443                  return T_('A woman');
3444          }
3445  
3446          return NULL;
3447      }

3450      /**
3451       * Return attr class depending on gender of the user
3452       */
3453  	function get_gender_class()
3454      {
3455          $gender_class = 'user';
3456  
3457          if( $this->check_status( 'is_closed' ) )
3458          { // Set different gender color if user is closed
3459              return 'user closed';
3460          }
3461  
3462          if( ! check_setting( 'gender_colored' ) )
3463          { // Don't set gender color if setting is OFF
3464              return $gender_class;
3465          }
3466  
3467          switch( $this->gender )
3468          { // Set a class name for each gender type
3469              case 'M':
3470                  $gender_class .= ' man';
3471                  break;
3472              case 'F':
3473                  $gender_class .= ' woman';
3474                  break;
3475              default:
3476                  $gender_class .= ' nogender';
3477                  break;
3478          }
3479  
3480          return $gender_class;
3481      }

3531  	function has_avatar()
3532      {
3533          global $Settings;
3534  
3535          return ( !empty( $this->avatar_file_ID ) && $Settings->get('allow_avatars') );
3536      }
