3539      /**
3540       * Get {@link File} object of the user's avatar.
3541       *
3542       * @return File This may be NULL.
3543       */
3544      function & get_avatar_File()
3545      {
3546          $File = NULL;
3547  
3548          if( $this->has_avatar() )
3549          {
3550              $FileCache = & get_FileCache();
3551  
3552              // Do not halt on error. A file can disappear without the profile being updated.
3553              /**
3554               * @var File
3555               */
3556              $File = & $FileCache->get_by_ID( $this->avatar_file_ID, false, false );
3557          }
3558  
3559          return $File;
3560      }
3561  
3562  
3563      /**
3564       * Get {@link Link} object of the user's avatar.
3565       *
3566       * @return Link This may be NULL.
3567       */
3568      function & get_avatar_Link()
3569      {
3570          $Link = NULL;
3571  
3572          if( $this->has_avatar() )
3573          {
3574              $LinkOwner = new LinkUser( $this );
3575              $Link = $LinkOwner->get_link_by_file_ID( $this->avatar_file_ID );
3576          }
3577  
3578          return $Link;
3579      }
3580  
3581  
3582      /**
3583       * Get array of {@link Link} objects of the previously uploaded avatars.
3584       *
3585       * @param boolean TRUE - to exclude main picture from list
3586       * @param boolean TRUE - to ignore the settings and get the avatars anyway
3587       * @return array of Links
3588       */
3589  	function get_avatar_Links( $exclude_main_picture = true, $ignore_settings = false )
3590      {
3591          global $Settings;
3592  
3593          $avatar_Links = array();
3594  
3595          if( !$ignore_settings && !( $Settings->get('upload_enabled') && $Settings->get( 'fm_enable_roots_user' ) ) )
3596          { // Upload is not enabled and we have no permission to use it...
3597              return $avatar_Links;
3598          }
3599  
3600          $LinkOwner = new LinkUser( $this );
3601          foreach( $LinkOwner->get_Links() as $user_Link )
3602          {
3603              $l_File = & $user_Link->get_File();
3604              if( $l_File->is_image() )
3605              {
3606                  if( $exclude_main_picture && $l_File->ID == $this->avatar_file_ID )
3607                  { // Exclude the main picture from list of other pictures
3608                      continue;
3609                  }
3610                  $avatar_Links[] = $user_Link;
3611              }
3612          }
3613  
3614          return $avatar_Links;
3615      }
3616  
3617  
3618      /**
3619       * Get avatar IMG tag.
3620       *
3621       * @param string size
3622       * @param string class
3623       * @param string align
3624       * @param boolean true if the avatar image should be zoomed on click, false otherwise
3625       * @param string avatar overlay text
3626       * @param string group name for lightbox plugin
3627       * @return string
3628       */
3629  	function get_avatar_imgtag( $size = 'crop-top-64x64', $class = 'avatar', $align = '', $zoomable = false, $avatar_overlay_text = '', $lightbox_group = '' )
3630      {
3631          global $current_User;
3632  
3633          /**
3634           * @var Link
3635           */
3636          $Link = & $this->get_avatar_Link();
3637  
3638          /**
3639           * @var File
3640           */
3641          if( ! $Link || ! $File = & $Link->get_File() )
3642          { // User doesn't have an avatar
3643              return get_avatar_imgtag_default( $size, $class, $align, array(
3644                      'email'  => $this->get( 'email' ),
3645                      'gender' => $this->get( 'gender' ),
3646                  ) );
3647          }
3648  
3649          if( ( !$this->check_status( 'can_display_avatar' ) ) && !( is_admin_page() && is_logged_in( false ) && ( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) ) ) )
3650          { // if the user status doesn't allow to display avatar and current User is not an admin in admin interface, then show default avatar
3651              return get_avatar_imgtag_default( $size, $class, $align, array(
3652                      'email' => $this->get( 'email' ),
3653                      'gender' => $this->get( 'gender' ),
3654                  ) );
3655          }
3656  
3657          if( $zoomable )
3658          {    // return clickable avatar tag, zoom on click
3659              if( is_logged_in() )
3660              {    // Only logged in users can see a big picture of the avatar
3661                  // set random value to link_rel, this way the pictures on the page won't be grouped
3662                  // this is usefull because the same avatar picture may appear more times in the same page
3663                  if( empty( $lightbox_group ) )
3664                  {
3665                      $link_rel = 'lightbox[l'.$Link->ID.rand(0, 100000).']';
3666                  }
3667                  else
3668                  {
3669                      $link_rel = 'lightbox['.$lightbox_group.']';
3670                  }
3671                  $r = $Link->get_tag( array(
3672                          'before_image'        => '',
3673                          'before_image_legend' => '',
3674                          'after_image_legend'  => '',
3675                          'after_image'         => '',
3676                          'image_size'          => $size,
3677                          'image_link_title'    => $this->login,
3678                          'image_link_rel'      => $link_rel,
3679                          'image_class'         => $class,
3680                          'image_align'         => $align,
3681                      ) );
3682              }
3683              else
3684              {    // Anonymous user get an avatar picture with link to login page
3685                  global $Blog;
3686                  $redirect_to = '';
3687                  if( isset( $Blog ) )
3688                  {    // Redirect user after login
3689                      $redirect_to = url_add_param( $Blog->gen_blogurl(), 'disp=user&user_ID='.$this->ID, '&' );
3690                  }
3691                  $r = '<a href="'.get_login_url( 'cannot see avatar', $redirect_to ) .'">'.$File->get_thumb_imgtag( $size, $class, $align ).'</a>';
3692              }
3693          }
3694          else
3695          {
3696              $r = $File->get_thumb_imgtag( $size, $class, $align );
3697          }
3698  
3699          if( $r != '' && $avatar_overlay_text != '' )
3700          {    // Add overlay text if it is enabled
3701              $r = $this->get_avatar_overlay_text( $r, $size, $avatar_overlay_text, $class );
3702          }
3703  
3704          return $r;
3705      }
3706  
3707  
3708      /**
3709       * Get overlay text for avatar img tag
3710       *
3711       * @param img tag
3712       * @param avatar size
3713       * @param avatar overlay text
3714       * @param string class
3715       * @return html string, img tag with overlay text
3716       */
3717  	function get_avatar_overlay_text( $img_tag, $size, $avatar_overlay_text, $class = '' )
3718      {
3719          preg_match( '/ width="(\d+)" height="(\d+)" /i', $img_tag, $img_sizes );
3720          if( count( $img_sizes ) == 3 )
3721          {    // img tag has a defined width & height
3722              $width = $img_sizes[1];
3723              $height = $img_sizes[2];
3724          }
3725          else
3726          {    // We try to get a sizes from config
3727              global $thumbnail_sizes;
3728              if( isset( $thumbnail_sizes[$size] ) )
3729              {    // Set a sizes
3730                  $width = $thumbnail_sizes[$size][1];
3731                  $height = $thumbnail_sizes[$size][2];
3732              }
3733          }
3734  
3735          if( empty( $width ) || empty( $height ) )
3736          {    // If sizes is not defined we cannot calculate a font-size for an overlay text
3737              return $img_tag;
3738          }
3739  
3740          $overlay_lines = explode( "\n", str_replace( "\r", '', $avatar_overlay_text ) );
3741          $max_line_length = 0;
3742          foreach( $overlay_lines as $line )
3743          {    // Find the most long line of the overlay text
3744              if( $max_line_length < strlen($line) )
3745              {    // Get max long line
3746                  $max_line_length = strlen($line);
3747              }
3748          }
3749          if( $max_line_length > 0 )
3750          {    // Display an overlay text if max length is defined
3751              // Calculate approximate font size, 1.7 - is custom coefficient of the font
3752              $font_size = ceil( ( $width / $max_line_length ) * 1.7 );
3753              // Set line-height for centering text by vertical
3754              $line_height = ceil( ( $height / count( $overlay_lines ) ) * 0.82 );
3755              // Padding-top give us a vertical centering
3756              $padding_top = ceil( $line_height * 0.32 );
3757  
3758              $tag_is_linked = false;
3759              if( strpos( $img_tag, '</a>' ) !== false )
3760              {    // img_tag is located inside tag <a>, we should to remove a end of the tag and then add
3761                  $img_tag = str_replace( '</a>', '', $img_tag );
3762                  $tag_is_linked = true;
3763              }
3764              $img_tag = '<div class="bubletip_overlay_text '.$class.'">'.
3765                      $img_tag.
3766                      '<div style="font-size:'.$font_size.'px;line-height:'.$line_height.'px;padding-top:'.$padding_top.'px">'.
3767                          nl2br($avatar_overlay_text).
3768                      '</div>';
3769              if( $tag_is_linked )
3770              {    // Add end of the tag which is removed above
3771                  $img_tag .= '</a>';
3772              }
3773              $img_tag .= '</div>';
3774          }
3775  
3776          return $img_tag;
3777      }
3778  
3779  
3780      /**
3781       * Get styled avatar
3782       *
3783       * @param array params
3784       * @return string
3785       */
3786  	function get_avatar_styled( $params = array() )
3787      {
3788          global $thumbnail_sizes;
3789  
3790          $params = array_merge( array(
3791                  'block_class'  => 'avatar_rounded',
3792                  'size'         => 'crop-top-64x64',
3793                  'avatar_class' => 'avatar',
3794                  'zoomable'     => false,
3795                  'overlay_text' => '',
3796                  'show_login'   => true,
3797                  'bubbletip'    => true,
3798              ), $params );
3799  
3800          $bubbletip_param = '';
3801          if( $params['bubbletip'] )
3802          {    // Init bubbletip param
3803              $bubbletip_param = 'rel="bubbletip_user_'.$this->ID.'"';
3804          }
3805  
3806          $style_width = '';
3807          if( isset( $thumbnail_sizes[$params['size']] ) )
3808          {
3809              $style_width = ' style="width:'.$thumbnail_sizes[$params['size']][1].'px"';
3810          }
3811  
3812          $identity_url = get_user_identity_url( $this->ID );
3813  
3814          if( !empty( $identity_url ) )
3815          {
3816              $r = '<a href="'.$identity_url.'" class="'.$params['block_class'].'"'.$bubbletip_param.$style_width.'>';
3817          }
3818          else
3819          {
3820              $r = '<div class="'.$params['block_class'].'"'.$bubbletip_param.$style_width.'>';
3821          }
3822  
3823          $r .= $this->get_avatar_imgtag( $params['size'], $params['avatar_class'], '', $params['zoomable'], $params['overlay_text'] );
3824  
3825          if( $params['show_login'] )
3826          {    // Display user name
3827              $r .= $this->get_colored_login();
3828          }
3829  
3830          $r .= !empty( $identity_url ) ? '</a>' : '</div>';
3831  
3832          return $r;
3833      }

3856  
3857      /**
3858       * Load userfields
3859       */
3860  	function userfields_load()
3861      {
3862          global $DB;
3863  
3864          $userfields = $DB->get_results( '
3865              SELECT uf_ID, ufdf_ID, uf_varchar, ufdf_duplicated, ufdf_type, ufdf_name, ufgp_ID, ufgp_name
3866                  FROM T_users__fields
3867                      LEFT JOIN T_users__fielddefs ON uf_ufdf_ID = ufdf_ID
3868                      LEFT JOIN T_users__fieldgroups ON ufdf_ufgp_ID = ufgp_ID
3869              WHERE uf_user_ID = '.$this->ID.'
3870                  AND ufdf_required != "hidden"
3871              ORDER BY ufgp_order, ufdf_order, uf_ID' );
3872  
3873          $userfield_lists = array();
3874          foreach( $userfields as $userfield )
3875          {
3876              if( $userfield->ufdf_duplicated == 'list' )
3877              {    // Prepare a values of list into one array
3878                  if( !isset( $userfield_lists[$userfield->ufdf_ID] ) )
3879                  {    // Init array
3880                      $userfield_lists[$userfield->ufdf_ID] = array();
3881                  }
3882                  userfield_prepare( $userfield );
3883                  $userfield_lists[$userfield->ufdf_ID][] = $userfield->uf_varchar;
3884              }
3885          }
3886  
3887          foreach( $userfields as $userfield )
3888          {
3889              if( $userfield->ufdf_duplicated == 'list' )
3890              {    // List style
3891                  if( isset( $userfield_lists[$userfield->ufdf_ID] ) )
3892                  {    // Save all data for this field:
3893                      $userfield->uf_varchar = implode( ', ', $userfield_lists[$userfield->ufdf_ID] );
3894                      $this->userfields[$userfield->uf_ID] = $userfield;
3895                      // Unset array to avoid a duplicates
3896                      unset( $userfield_lists[$userfield->ufdf_ID] );
3897                  }
3898              }
3899              else
3900              {    // Save all data for this field:
3901                  userfield_prepare( $userfield );
3902                  $this->userfields[$userfield->uf_ID] = $userfield;
3903              }
3904              // Save index
3905              $this->userfields_by_type[$userfield->ufdf_ID][] = $userfield->uf_ID;
3906          }
3907  
3908          // Also make sure the definitions are loaded
3909          $this->userfield_defs_load();
3910      }
3911  
3912  
3913      /**
3914       * Load userfields defs
3915       */
3916  	function userfield_defs_load()
3917      {
3918          global $DB;
3919  
3920          if( !isset($this->userfield_defs) )
3921          {
3922              $userfield_defs = $DB->get_results( '
3923                  SELECT ufdf_ID, ufdf_type, ufdf_name, ufdf_required, ufdf_options, ufdf_duplicated
3924                      FROM T_users__fielddefs' );
3925  
3926              foreach( $userfield_defs as $userfield_def )
3927              {
3928                  $this->userfield_defs[$userfield_def->ufdf_ID] = array(
3929                      $userfield_def->ufdf_type,
3930                      $userfield_def->ufdf_name,
3931                      $userfield_def->ufdf_required,
3932                      $userfield_def->ufdf_options,
3933                      $userfield_def->ufdf_duplicated
3934                  ); //jamesz
3935              }
3936          }
3937      }

3958      /**
3959       * Update user data from Request form fields.
3960       *
3961       * @param boolean is new user
3962       * @return mixed true on success, allowed action otherwise
3963       */
3964  	function update_from_request( $is_new_user = false )
3965      {
3966          global $current_User, $DB, $Messages, $UserSettings, $Settings, $blog, $admin_url;
3967  
3968          if( !$current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) && $this->ID != $current_User->ID )
3969          { // user is only allowed to update him/herself
3970              $Messages->add( T_('You are only allowed to update your own profile!') );
3971              return 'view';
3972          }
3973  
3974          // check if is admin form
3975          $is_admin_form = param( 'admin_form', 'boolean', false );
3976  
3977          // memorize user status ( activated or not )
3978          $user_was_activated = $this->check_status( 'is_validated' );
3979          $user_old_email = $this->email;
3980  
3981          // memorize user old login, status and root path, before update
3982          $user_old_login = $this->login;
3983          $user_root_path = NULL;
3984          $FileRootCache = & get_FileRootCache();
3985          if( !$is_new_user )
3986          {
3987              $user_FileRoot = & $FileRootCache->get_by_type_and_ID( 'user', $this->ID );
3988              if( $user_FileRoot && file_exists( $user_FileRoot->ads_path ) )
3989              {
3990                  $user_root_path = $user_FileRoot->ads_path;
3991              }
3992          }
3993  
3994          // load data from request
3995          if( !$this->load_from_Request() )
3996          {    // We have found validation errors:
3997              if( $is_new_user || ( $is_admin_form && ( $this->ID != 1 ) ) )
3998              { // update user status settings but not save
3999                  $this->update_status_from_Request( false );
4000              }
4001              return 'edit';
4002          }
4003  
4004          // Update user
4005          $DB->begin();
4006  
4007          $is_password_form = param( 'password_form', 'boolean', false );
4008          if( $this->dbsave() )
4009          {
4010              $update_success = true;
4011              if( $is_new_user )
4012              {
4013                  $Messages->add( T_('New user has been created.'), 'success' );
4014              }
4015              elseif( $is_password_form )
4016              {
4017                  $Messages->add( T_('Password has been changed.'), 'success' );
4018              }
4019              else
4020              {
4021                  if( $user_old_login != $this->login && $user_root_path != NULL )
4022                  { // user login changed and user has a root directory (another way $user_root_path value would be NULL)
4023                      $FileRootCache->clear();
4024                      $user_FileRoot = & $FileRootCache->get_by_type_and_ID( 'user', $this->ID );
4025                      if( $user_FileRoot )
4026                      { // user FilerRooot exists, rename user root folder
4027                          if( ! @rename( $user_root_path, $user_FileRoot->ads_path ) )
4028                          { // unsuccessful folder rename
4029                              $Messages->add( sprintf( T_('You cannot choose the new login "%s" (cannot rename user fileroot)'), $this->login), 'error' );
4030                              $update_success = false;
4031                          }
4032                      }
4033                  }
4034                  if( $update_success )
4035                  {
4036                      $Messages->add( T_('Profile has been updated.'), 'success' );
4037                  }
4038              }
4039  
4040              if( $update_success )
4041              {
4042                  $user_field_url = $this->get_field_url( true );
4043                  if( $user_field_url != '' )
4044                  {    // Update url from extra user fields
4045                      $this->set( 'url', $user_field_url );
4046                      $this->dbsave();
4047                  }
4048  
4049                  $DB->commit();
4050              }
4051              else
4052              {
4053                  $DB->rollback();
4054              }
4055          }
4056          else
4057          {
4058              $DB->rollback();
4059              $update_success = false;
4060              $Messages->add( 'New user creation error', 'error' );
4061          }
4062  
4063          // Update user status settings
4064          if( ( $is_new_user || ( $is_admin_form && $this->ID != 1 ) ) && ( ! $this->update_status_from_Request( true ) ) )
4065          {
4066              $Messages->add( T_( 'User status couldn\'t be updated!' ), 'error' );
4067          }
4068  
4069          $try_to_send_validate_email = ( $is_new_user || $user_was_activated || ( $user_old_email != $this->email ) );
4070          if( $update_success && $try_to_send_validate_email && $this->check_status( 'can_be_validated' ) )
4071          { // user was deactivated somehow ( or it was just created right now ), check if we need to send validation email
4072              if( ( $Settings->get( 'validation_process' ) != 'easy' ) && ( $current_User->ID != $this->ID ) )
4073              { // validation process is set to secure, we may send activation email only if this user is the current_User
4074                  $reg_settings_url = 'href="'.url_add_param( $admin_url, 'ctrl=registration' ).'#fieldset_wrapper_account_activation"';
4075                  $Messages->add( sprintf( T_( 'Because the Account Activation Process is set to <a %s>Secure</a>, the user will have to request a new activation email next time he tries to log in.' ), $reg_settings_url ), 'note' );
4076              }
4077              else
4078              { // validation process is easy, send email with permanent activation link
4079                  if( $this->send_validate_email( NULL, $blog, ( $user_old_email != $this->email ) ) )
4080                  {
4081                      if( $current_User->ID == $this->ID )
4082                      {
4083                          $redirect_to = NULL;
4084                          if( ( !is_admin_page() ) && ( !empty( $blog ) ) )
4085                          { // set where to redirect in front office, another way it would go to profile_update.php
4086                              $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
4087                              $Blog = $BlogCache->get_by_ID( $blog, false );
4088                              $redirect_to = rawurlencode( url_add_param( $Blog->gen_blogurl(), 'disp=userprefs' ) );
4089                          }
4090                          $activate_info_link = 'href="'.get_activate_info_url( $redirect_to ).'"';
4091                          $Messages->add( sprintf( T_('An email has been sent to your email address (%s). Please click on the link therein to activate your account. <a %s>More info &raquo;</a>' ), $this->dget('email'), $activate_info_link ), 'success' );
4092                      }
4093                      else
4094                      {
4095                          $Messages->add( sprintf( T_('An account activation email has been sent to %s' ), $this->login ), 'success' );
4096                      }
4097                  }
4098                  elseif( isset( $demo_mode ) && $demo_mode )
4099                  {
4100                      $Messages->add( 'Could not send activation email. Sending emails is disabled in demo mode.', 'note' );
4101                  }
4102              }
4103          }
4104  
4105          // Update user settings:
4106          $is_preferences_form = param( 'preferences_form', 'boolean', false );
4107          $is_subscriptions_form = param( 'subscriptions_form', 'boolean', false );
4108          if( $is_preferences_form || $is_subscriptions_form || $is_admin_form )
4109          { // Update UserSettings
4110              if( $UserSettings->dbupdate() && ( $is_preferences_form || $is_subscriptions_form ) )
4111              { // Show feature settings update successful message on user preferences form
4112                  $Messages->add( T_('User feature settings have been changed.'), 'success');
4113              }
4114          }
4115  
4116          return true;
4117      }

4120      /**
4121       * Handle close user account request and update account close reason
4122       *
4123       * @param boolean save modifications or not. User false only in case when User and UserSettings object will be saved later.
4124       * @return boolean true on success, false otherwise
4125       */
4126  	function update_status_from_Request( $dbsave, $new_status = NULL )
4127      {
4128          global $DB, $UserSettings, $current_User, $servertimenow;
4129  
4130          if( $dbsave )
4131          { // save required
4132              $DB->begin();
4133          }
4134  
4135          if( empty( $new_status ) )
4136          {
4137              $new_status = param( 'edited_user_status', 'string', true );
4138          }
4139  
4140          // a close reason type thst is selected from list
4141          $account_close_type = param( 'account_close_type', 'string', '' );
4142          // a close reason text - max 255 characters
4143          $account_close_reason = substr( param( 'account_close_reason', 'text', '' ), 0, 255 );
4144          if( ( !$this->check_status( 'is_closed' ) ) && ( $new_status == 'closed' ) )
4145          { // account was not closed yet
4146              if( empty( $account_close_reason ) && empty( $account_close_type ) )
4147              { // Default value of reason
4148                  $account_close_reason = T_( 'Other' );
4149              }
4150              $this->set( 'status', 'closed' );
4151              $UserSettings->set( 'account_close_ts', $servertimenow, $this->ID );
4152              $UserSettings->set( 'account_close_reason', trim( $account_close_type.' '.$account_close_reason ), $this->ID );
4153              // delete last activation email data, this user must not be allowed to reactivate the account ( only admin users may change the status again )
4154              $UserSettings->delete( 'last_activation_reminder_key', $this->ID );
4155              $UserSettings->delete( 'last_activation_email', $this->ID );
4156              // create query to clear all session's of the user
4157              $clear_sessions_query = 'UPDATE T_sessions
4158                                  SET sess_key = NULL
4159                                  WHERE sess_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID );
4160              if( $dbsave && $this->dbupdate() && $UserSettings->dbupdate() && ( $DB->query( $clear_sessions_query ) !== false ) )
4161              { // all db modification was successful
4162                  $DB->commit();
4163                  if( $current_User->ID != $this->ID )
4164                  {    // If admin closed some user account
4165                      // Send notification email about closed account to users with edit users permission
4166                      $email_template_params = array(
4167                              'login'   => $this->login,
4168                              'email'   => $this->email,
4169                              'reason'  => $account_close_reason,
4170                              'user_ID' => $this->ID,
4171                              'closed_by_admin' => $current_User->login,
4172                          );
4173                      send_admin_notification( NT_('User account closed'), 'account_closed', $email_template_params );
4174                  }
4175                  return true;
4176              }
4177          }
4178          else
4179          {
4180              $new_status_is_active = ( $new_status == 'activated' || $new_status == 'autoactivated' );
4181              $old_status_is_not_active = false;
4182              if( $this->check_status( 'can_be_validated' ) && $new_status_is_active )
4183              { // User was activated
4184                  $old_status_is_not_active = true;
4185                  // clear activation specific settings
4186                  $UserSettings->delete( 'last_activation_reminder_key', $this->ID );
4187                  $UserSettings->delete( 'last_activation_email', $this->ID );
4188                  $UserSettings->delete( 'activation_reminder_count', $this->ID );
4189                  $UserSettings->delete( 'send_activation_reminder', $this->ID );
4190              }
4191              $old_status_is_not_active = ( $old_status_is_not_active || $this->check_status( 'is_closed' ) );
4192  
4193              // set status
4194              $this->set( 'status', $new_status );
4195              $UserSettings->set( 'account_close_reason', $account_close_reason, $this->ID );
4196              if( $dbsave && $this->dbupdate() )
4197              { // db update
4198                  $UserSettings->dbupdate();
4199                  $DB->commit();
4200                  if( $old_status_is_not_active && $new_status_is_active )
4201                  { // User was activated, create a welcome private message
4202                      $this->send_welcome_message();
4203  
4204                      if( $current_User->ID != $this->ID )
4205                      {    // If admin activated some user account
4206                          // Send notification email about activated account to users with edit users permission
4207                          $email_template_params = array(
4208                              'User' => $this,
4209                              'login' => $this->login, // this is required in the send_admin_notification
4210                              'activated_by_admin' => $current_User->login,
4211                          );
4212                          send_admin_notification( NT_('New user account activated'), 'account_activated', $email_template_params );
4213                      }
4214                  }
4215                  return true;
4216              }
4217          }
4218  
4219          if( $dbsave )
4220          { // save was required, but wasn't successful
4221              $DB->rollback();
4222              return false;
4223          }
4224  
4225          return true;
4226      }

4230       * Update profileupdate date. Call after a publicly visible user property was updated.
4231       */
4232  	function set_profileupdate_date()
4233      {

4235          if( ( !empty( $current_User ) ) && ( $this->ID == $current_User->ID ) )
4236          {

4242      /**
4243       * Update user avatar file
4244       *
4245       * @param integer the new avatar file ID
4246       * @return mixed true on success, allowed action otherwise
4247       */
4248  	function update_avatar( $file_ID )
4249      {
4250          global $current_User, $Messages;
4251  
4252          if( !$current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) && $this->ID != $current_User->ID )
4253          { // user is only allowed to update him/herself
4254              $Messages->add( T_('You are only allowed to update your own profile!'), 'error' );
4255              return 'view';
4256          }
4257  
4258          if( $file_ID == NULL )
4259          {
4260              $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture could not be changed!'), 'error' );
4261              return 'edit';
4262          }
4263  
4264          $FileCache = & get_FileCache();
4265          $File = $FileCache->get_by_ID( $file_ID );
4266          if( $File->_FileRoot->type == 'user' && $File->_FileRoot->in_type_ID != $this->ID )
4267          { // don't allow to use pictures from other users
4268              $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture could not be changed!'), 'error' );
4269              return 'edit';
4270          }
4271  
4272          $this->set( 'avatar_file_ID', $file_ID, true );
4273          // update profileupdate_date, because a publicly visible user property was changed
4274          $this->set_profileupdate_date();
4275          $this->dbupdate();
4276  
4277          $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture has been changed.'), 'success' );
4278  
4279          // Send notification email about the changes of user account
4280          $this->send_account_changed_notification( true );
4281  
4282          return true;
4283      }

4290       * @param array Params
4291       * @return string HTML text with 3 icons to rotate avatar
4292       */
4293  	function get_rotate_avatar_icons( $file_ID, $params = array() )
4294      {

4297                  'before' => '<br />',
4298                  'after' => '',
4299              ), $params );
4300

4305              $url_rotate_180 = regenerate_url( '', 'user_tab=avatar&user_ID='.$this->ID.'&action=rotate_avatar_180&file_ID='.$file_ID.'&'.url_crumb('user'), '', '&');
4306              $url_rotate_90_right = regenerate_url( '', 'user_tab=avatar&user_ID='.$this->ID.'&action=rotate_avatar_90_right&file_ID='.$file_ID.'&'.url_crumb('user'), '', '&');

4309          {    // Front-office
4310              global $Blog;
4311              $url_rotate_90_left = get_secure_htsrv_url().'profile_update.php?user_tab=avatar&blog='.$Blog->ID.'&user_ID='.$this->ID.'&action=rotate_avatar_90_left&file_ID='.$file_ID.'&'.url_crumb('user');
4312              $url_rotate_180 = get_secure_htsrv_url().'profile_update.php?user_tab=avatar&blog='.$Blog->ID.'&user_ID='.$this->ID.'&action=rotate_avatar_180&file_ID='.$file_ID.'&'.url_crumb('user');
4313              $url_rotate_90_right = get_secure_htsrv_url().'profile_update.php?user_tab=avatar&blog='.$Blog->ID.'&user_ID='.$this->ID.'&action=rotate_avatar_90_right&file_ID='.$file_ID.'&'.url_crumb('user');
4314          }

4317

4319          $html .= action_icon( T_('Rotate this picture 180&deg;'), 'rotate_180', $url_rotate_180, '', 0, 0, array( 'style' => 'margin-right:4px' ) );
4320          $html .= action_icon( T_('Rotate this picture 90&deg; to the right'), 'rotate_right', $url_rotate_90_right, '', 0, 0 );
4321

4323  
4324          return $html;
4325      }

4328      /**
4329       * Rotate user avatar file
4330       *
4331       * @param integer the new avatar file ID
4332       * @return mixed TRUE on success;
4333       *               Error code on denied action:
4334       *                 'only_own_profile' - User can update only own profile
4335       *                 'wrong_file'       - Request with wrong file ID
4336       *                 'other_user'       - Restricted to edit files from other users
4337       *                 'rotate_error'     - Some errors in rotate function
4338       */
4339  	function rotate_avatar( $file_ID, $degrees )
4340      {
4341          global $current_User, $Messages;
4342  
4343          if( !$current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) && $this->ID != $current_User->ID )
4344          { // user is only allowed to update him/herself
4345              $Messages->add( T_('You are only allowed to update your own profile!'), 'error' );
4346              return 'only_own_profile';
4347          }
4348  
4349          if( $file_ID == NULL )
4350          {
4351              $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture could not be rotated!'), 'error' );
4352              return 'wrong_file';
4353          }
4354  
4355          $FileCache = & get_FileCache();
4356          if( !$File = $FileCache->get_by_ID( $file_ID, false ) )
4357          {    // File does't exist
4358              $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture could not be rotated!'), 'error' );
4359              return 'wrong_file';
4360          }
4361  
4362          if( $File->_FileRoot->type != 'user' || $File->_FileRoot->in_type_ID != $this->ID )
4363          {    // don't allow use the pictures from other users
4364              $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture could not be rotated!'), 'error' );
4365              return 'other_user';
4366          }
4367  
4368          load_funcs( 'files/model/_image.funcs.php' );
4369  
4370          if( !rotate_image( $File, $degrees ) )
4371          {    // Some errors were during rotate the avatar
4372              $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture could not be rotated!'), 'error' );
4373              return 'rotate_error';
4374          }
4375  
4376          $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture has been rotated.'), 'success' );
4377          return true;
4378      }

4404      /**
4405       * Delete user avatar file
4406       *
4407       * @param integer the avatar file ID
4408       * @return mixed true on success, allowed action otherwise
4409       */
4410  	function delete_avatar( $file_ID )
4411      {
4412          global $current_User, $Messages;
4413  
4414          if( !$current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) && $this->ID != $current_User->ID )
4415          { // user is only allowed to update him/herself
4416              $Messages->add( T_('You are only allowed to update your own profile!'), 'error' );
4417              return 'view';
4418          }
4419  
4420          if( $file_ID == NULL )
4421          {
4422              $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture could not be changed!'), 'error' );
4423              return 'edit';
4424          }
4425  
4426          $LinkOwner = new LinkUser( $this );
4427          $Link = & $LinkOwner->get_link_by_file_ID( $file_ID );
4428          if( $Link )
4429          {
4430              $File = $Link->get_File();
4431              $LinkOwner->remove_link( $Link );
4432          }
4433          else
4434          {
4435              $FileCache = & get_FileCache();
4436              $File = $FileCache->get_by_ID( $file_ID );
4437          }
4438  
4439          if( $file_ID == $this->avatar_file_ID )
4440          {    // Unset this picture from user avatar if it is used as main picture
4441              $this->set( 'avatar_file_ID', NULL, true );
4442              $this->dbupdate();
4443          }
4444  
4445          if( ( $File->_FileRoot->type == 'user' ) && ( $File->_FileRoot->in_type_ID == $this->ID )
4446              && ( strpos( $File->get_rdfp_rel_path(), 'profile_pictures' ) === 0 ) )
4447          { // Delete the file if it is in the current User profile_pictures folder
4448              $File->unlink();
4449          }
4450  
4451          $Messages->add( T_('Your picture has been deleted.'), 'success' );
4452          return true;
4453      }

4456      /**
4457       * Update user avatar file to the currently uploaded file
4458       *
4459       * @return mixed true on success, allowed action otherwise.
4460       */
4461  	function update_avatar_from_upload()
4462      {
4463          global $current_User, $Messages, $Settings;
4464  
4465          if( !$current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) && $this->ID != $current_User->ID )
4466          {    // user is only allowed to update him/herself
4467              $Messages->add( T_('You are only allowed to update your own profile!'), 'error' );
4468              return 'view';
4469          }
4470  
4471          // process upload
4472          $FileRootCache = & get_FileRootCache();
4473          $root = FileRoot::gen_ID( 'user', $this->ID );
4474          $result = process_upload( $root, 'profile_pictures', true, false, true, false, $Settings->get( 'min_picture_size' ) );
4475          if( empty( $result ) )
4476          {
4477              $Messages->add( T_( 'You don\'t have permission to selected user file root.' ), 'error' );
4478              return 'view';
4479          }
4480  
4481          $uploadedFiles = $result['uploadedFiles'];
4482          if( !empty( $uploadedFiles ) )
4483          {    // upload was successful
4484              $File = $uploadedFiles[0];
4485              if( $File->is_image() )
4486              {    // uploaded file is an image
4487                  $LinkOwner = new LinkUser( $this );
4488                  $File->link_to_Object( $LinkOwner );
4489                  $avatar_changed = false;
4490                  if( empty( $this->avatar_file_ID ) )
4491                  {    // set uploaded image as avatar
4492                      $this->set( 'avatar_file_ID', $File->ID, true );
4493                      // update profileupdate_date, because a publicly visible user property was changed
4494                      $this->set_profileupdate_date();
4495                      $this->dbupdate();
4496                      $avatar_changed = true;
4497                      $Messages->add( T_('Your profile picture has been changed.'), 'success' );
4498                  }
4499                  else
4500                  {    // User already has the avatar
4501                      $Messages->add( T_('New picture has been uploaded.'), 'success' );
4502                  }
4503                  // Clear previous Links to load new uploaded file
4504                  $LinkOwner->clear_Links();
4505                  // Send notification email about the changes of user account
4506                  $this->send_account_changed_notification( $avatar_changed, $File->ID );
4507                  return true;
4508              }
4509              else
4510              {    // uploaded file is not an image, delete the file
4511                  $Messages->add( T_( 'The file you uploaded does not seem to be an image.' ) );
4512                  $File->unlink();
4513              }
4514          }
4515  
4516          $failedFiles = $result['failedFiles'];
4517          if( !empty( $failedFiles ) )
4518          {
4519              $Messages->add( $failedFiles[0] );
4520          }
4521  
4522          return 'edit';
4523      }

4526      /**
4527       * Get session param from the user last session
4528       *
4529       * @param string param name
4530       * @return mixed param value
4531       */
4532  	function get_last_session_param( $parname )
4533      {
4534          global $DB;
4535  
4536          $parname = 'sess_'.$parname;
4537          $query = 'SELECT sess_ID, '.$parname.'
4538                      FROM T_sessions
4539                      WHERE sess_user_ID = '.$this->ID.'
4540                      ORDER BY sess_ID DESC
4541                      LIMIT 1';
4542          $result = $DB->get_row( $query );
4543          if( !empty( $result ) )
4544          {
4545              return format_to_output( $result->$parname );
4546          }
4547  
4548          return NULL;
4549      }

4551      /**
4552       * Get session param from the user first session, hit
4553       * @param integer Session Id
4554       * @return object of params
4555       */
4556  	function get_first_session_hit_params( $sess_id )
4557      {
4558          global $DB;
4559  
4560          $query = 'SELECT *
4561                      FROM T_hitlog
4562                      WHERE hit_sess_ID = '.$DB->quote( $sess_id ).'
4563                      ORDER BY hit_ID ASC
4564                      LIMIT 1';
4565  
4566          $result = $DB->get_row( $query );
4567  
4568          if( !empty( $result ) )
4569          {
4570              return $result;
4571          }
4572  
4573          return NULL;
4574      }
4575  
4576      /**
4577       * Send a welcome private message
4578       */
4579  	function send_welcome_message()
4580      {
4581          global $Settings, $UserSettings;
4582  
4583          if( !$Settings->get( 'welcomepm_enabled' ) )
4584          { // Sending of welcome PM is disabled
4585              return false;
4586          }
4587  
4588          if( $UserSettings->get( 'welcome_message_sent', $this->ID ) )
4589          { // User already received the welcome message
4590              return false;
4591          }
4592  
4593          if( !$this->accepts_pm() )
4594          { // user can't read private messages, or doesn't want to receive private messages
4595              return false;
4596          }
4597  
4598          // Check sender user login for existing
4599          $UserCache = & get_UserCache();
4600          $User = $UserCache->get_by_login( $Settings->get( 'welcomepm_from' ) );
4601          if( !$User )
4602          { // Don't send an welcome email if sender login is incorrect
4603              return false;
4604          }
4605  
4606          load_class( 'messaging/model/_thread.class.php', 'Thread' );
4607          load_class( 'messaging/model/_message.class.php', 'Message' );
4608  
4609          // Insert new thread:
4610          $edited_Thread = new Thread();
4611          $edited_Message = new Message();
4612          $edited_Message->Thread = & $edited_Thread;
4613          $edited_Message->Thread->set( 'title', $Settings->get( 'welcomepm_title' ) );
4614          $edited_Message->Thread->recipients_list = array( $this->ID );
4615          $edited_Message->set( 'author_user_ID', $User->ID );
4616          $edited_Message->creator_user_ID = $User->ID;
4617          $edited_Message->set( 'text', $Settings->get( 'welcomepm_message' ) );
4618          if( $edited_Message->dbinsert_individual( $User ) )
4619          { // The welcome message was sent/created successfully
4620              // Change user setting to TRUE in order to don't send it twice
4621              $UserSettings->set( 'welcome_message_sent', 1, $this->ID );
4622              $UserSettings->dbupdate();
4623          }
4624      }

4627      /**
4628       * Update notification sender's info from General settings
4629       *
4630       * @param boolean TRUE - to force an updating of the fields
4631       */
4632  	function update_sender( $force_update = false )
4633      {
4634          global $Settings, $UserSettings;
4635  
4636          if( $force_update || $UserSettings->get( 'notification_sender_email', $this->ID ) == '' )
4637          { // Update sender's email
4638              $UserSettings->set( 'notification_sender_email', $Settings->get( 'notification_sender_email' ), $this->ID );
4639          }
4640          if( $force_update || ( ( $UserSettings->get( 'notification_sender_name', $this->ID ) == '' ) && ( $Settings->get( 'notification_sender_name' ) != 'b2evo mailer' ) ) )
4641          { // Update sender's name if it was not set and the general settings has different value then the default
4642              $UserSettings->set( 'notification_sender_name', $Settings->get( 'notification_sender_name' ), $this->ID );
4643          }
4644  
4645          $UserSettings->dbupdate();
4646      }

4649      /**
4650       * Get all own blogs of this user which current user can delete
4651       *
4652       * @return array Blogs
4653       */
4654  	function get_deleted_blogs()
4655      {
4656          global $DB, $current_User;
4657  
4658          // Get all own blogs of the edited user
4659          $BlogCache = & get_BlogCache();
4660          $BlogCache->ID_array = array();
4661          $user_Blogs = $BlogCache->load_where( 'blog_owner_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
4662  
4663          $deleted_Blogs = array();
4664          foreach( $user_Blogs as $user_Blog )
4665          {
4666              if( $current_User->check_perm( 'blog_properties', 'edit', false, $user_Blog->ID ) )
4667              {    // Current user has a permission to delete this blog
4668                  $deleted_Blogs[] = $user_Blog;
4669              }
4670          }
4671  
4672          return $deleted_Blogs;
4673      }

4677       * Delete all blogs of the user recursively
4678       *
4679       * @return boolean True on success
4680       */
4681  	function delete_blogs()
4682      {
4683          global $DB, $UserSettings, $current_User;
4684  
4685          $DB->begin();
4686  
4687          // Get all own blogs of this user which current user can delete
4688          $deleted_Blogs = $this->get_deleted_blogs();
4689  
4690          foreach( $deleted_Blogs as $deleted_Blog )
4691          {
4692              // Delete from DB:
4693              $deleted_Blog->dbdelete();
4694  
4695              set_working_blog( 0 );
4696              $UserSettings->delete( 'selected_blog' );    // Needed or subsequent pages may try to access the delete blog
4697              $UserSettings->dbupdate();
4698          }
4699  
4700          $DB->commit();
4701  
4702          return true;
4703      }

4706      /**
4707       * Get the posts of this user which current user can delete
4708       *
4709       * @param string Type of the deleted posts
4710       *               'created'        - the posts created by this user
4711       *               'edited'         - the posts edited by this user
4712       *               'created|edited' - the posts created OR edited by this user
4713       * @return array Items
4714       */
4715  	function get_deleted_posts( $type, $check_perm = true )
4716      {
4717          global $DB, $current_User;
4718  
4719          $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache();
4720          $ItemCache->ID_array = array();
4721          switch( $type )
4722          {
4723              case 'created':
4724                  $user_Items = $ItemCache->load_where( 'post_creator_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
4725                  break;
4726  
4727              case 'edited':
4728                  $user_Items = $ItemCache->load_where( 'post_lastedit_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
4729                  break;
4730  
4731              case 'created|edited':
4732                  $user_Items = $ItemCache->load_where( 'post_lastedit_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ).' OR post_creator_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
4733                  break;
4734          }
4735  
4736          $deleted_Items = array();
4737          foreach( $user_Items as $user_Item )
4738          {
4739              if( ( ! $check_perm ) || $current_User->check_perm( 'item_post!CURSTATUS', 'delete', false, $user_Item ) )
4740              {    // Current user has a permission to delete this item
4741                  $deleted_Items[] = $user_Item;
4742              }
4743          }
4744  
4745          return $deleted_Items;
4746      }

4749      /**
4750       * Delete posts of the user
4751       *
4752       * @param string Type of the deleted posts
4753       *               'created'        - the posts created by this user
4754       *               'edited'         - the posts edited by this user
4755       *               'created|edited' - the posts created OR edited by this user
4756       * @return boolean True on success
4757       */
4758  	function delete_posts( $type )
4759      {
4760          global $DB, $Plugins, $current_User;
4761  
4762          $DB->begin();
4763  
4764          // Get the posts of this user which current user can delete.
4765          // Note: If current user can moderate this user then it is allowed to delete all user data even if it wouldn't be allowed otherwise.
4766          $check_perm = ( ( $type != 'created' ) || ( ! $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) ) );
4767          $deleted_Items = $this->get_deleted_posts( $type, $check_perm );
4768  
4769          foreach( $deleted_Items as $deleted_Item )
4770          {
4771              $Plugins->trigger_event( 'AdminBeforeItemEditDelete', array( 'Item' => & $deleted_Item ) );
4772  
4773              // Delete from DB:
4774              $deleted_Item->dbdelete();
4775          }
4776  
4777          $DB->commit();
4778  
4779          return true;
4780      }

4802      /**
4803       * Check if current has at least one own comment to delete
4804       *
4805       * @return array Comments IDs
4806       */
4807  	function has_comment_to_delete()
4808      {
4809          global $current_User;
4810  
4811          $comments_IDs = $this->get_own_comments_IDs();
4812  
4813          if( ! count( $comments_IDs ) )
4814          { // User has no comments
4815              return false;
4816          }
4817  
4818          if( $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
4819          { // If current user can moderate this user then it is allowed to delete all user data even if it wouldn't be allowed otherwise.
4820              return true;
4821          }
4822  
4823          $CommentCache = & get_CommentCache();
4824  
4825          foreach( $comments_IDs as $comment_ID )
4826          {
4827              if( ( $user_Comment = & $CommentCache->get_by_ID( $comment_ID, false, false ) ) &&
4828                    $current_User->check_perm( 'comment!CURSTATUS', 'delete', false, $user_Comment ) )
4829              { // Current user has a permission to delete this comment
4830                  return true;
4831              }
4832              // Clear a cache to avoid a memory allocation error
4833              $CommentCache->clear();
4834          }
4835  
4836          return false;
4837      }

4839  
4840      /**
4841       * Delete comments of the user
4842       *
4843       * @return boolean True on success
4844       */
4845  	function delete_comments()
4846      {
4847          global $DB, $current_User;
4848  
4849          // If user has a huge amount of the comments it will takes many time to delete all comments
4850          set_max_execution_time( 900 );
4851  
4852          $DB->begin();
4853  
4854          // Get the comments of this user which current user can delete
4855          $comments_IDs = $this->get_own_comments_IDs();
4856  
4857          if( ! count( $comments_IDs ) )
4858          { // User has no comments
4859              return false;
4860          }
4861  
4862          $CommentCache = & get_CommentCache();
4863          $ItemCache = & get_ItemCache();
4864  
4865          // If current user can moderate this user then it is allowed to delete all user data even if it wouldn't be allowed otherwise.
4866          $current_user_can_moderate = $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' );
4867  
4868          foreach( $comments_IDs as $comment_ID )
4869          {
4870              $deleted_Comment = & $CommentCache->get_by_ID( $comment_ID, false, false );
4871              if( $deleted_Comment &&
4872                  ( $current_user_can_moderate ||
4873                    $current_User->check_perm( 'comment!CURSTATUS', 'delete', false, $deleted_Comment ) ) )
4874              { // Current user has a permission to delete this comment
4875                  // Delete from DB
4876                  $deleted_Comment->dbdelete( true );
4877              }
4878              // Clear a cache to avoid a memory allocation error
4879              $CommentCache->clear();
4880              $ItemCache->clear();
4881          }
4882  
4883          $DB->commit();
4884  
4885          return true;
4886      }

4889      /**
4890       * Delete private messaged of the user
4891       *
4892       * @return boolean True on success
4893       */
4894  	function delete_messages()
4895      {
4896          global $DB, $Plugins, $current_User;
4897  
4898          // Check permissions
4899          // Note: If current user can moderate this user then it is allowed to delete all user data even if it wouldn't be allowed otherwise
4900          if( ! $current_User->check_perm( 'users', 'edit' ) )
4901          { // Note: if users have delete messaging perms then they can delete any user messages ( Of course only if the delete action is available/displayed for them )
4902              $current_User->check_perm( 'perm_messaging', 'delete', true );
4903          }
4904  
4905          $DB->begin();
4906  
4907          $MessageCache = & get_MessageCache();
4908          $MessageCache->clear();
4909          $MessageCache->load_where( 'msg_author_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
4910          $message_was_deleted = false;
4911  
4912          while( ( $iterator_Message = & $MessageCache->get_next() ) != NULL )
4913          { // Iterate through MessageCache
4914              // Delete a message from DB:
4915              $iterator_Message->dbdelete();
4916              $message_was_deleted = true;
4917          }
4918  
4919          if( $message_was_deleted )
4920          { // at least one message was deleted
4921              // Delete statuses
4922              $DB->query( 'DELETE FROM T_messaging__threadstatus
4923                              WHERE tsta_user_ID = '.$DB->quote( $this->ID ) );
4924          }
4925  
4926          $DB->commit();
4927  
4928          return true;
4929      }

4932      /**
4933       * Get number of posts and percent of published posts by this user
4934       *
4935       * @param array Params
4936       * @return string Result
4937       */
4938  	function get_reputation_posts( $params = array() )
4939      {
4940          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
4941          $params = array_merge( array(
4942                  'text' => T_( '%s (%s%% are public)' ),
4943              ), $params );
4944  
4945          $total_num_posts = $this->get_num_posts();
4946          $public_num_posts = $this->get_num_posts( 'published' );
4947          if( $total_num_posts > 0 )
4948          { // Calc percent of published posts
4949              $public_percent = floor( $public_num_posts / $total_num_posts * 100 );
4950          }
4951          else
4952          { // To avoid devision by zero
4953              $public_percent = 0;
4954          }
4955  
4956          if( $total_num_posts > 0 )
4957          { // Make a link to page with user's posts
4958              $total_num_posts = '<a href="'.get_dispctrl_url( 'useritems&amp;user_ID='.$this->ID ).'"><b>'.$total_num_posts.'</b></a>';
4959          }
4960          else
4961          {
4962              $total_num_posts = '<b>'.$total_num_posts.'</b>';
4963          }
4964  
4965          return sprintf( $params['text'], $total_num_posts, $public_percent );
4966      }

5006      /**
5007       * Get number of helpful votes for this user
5008       *
5009       * @param array Params
5010       * @return string Result
5011       */
5012  	function get_reputation_helpful( $params = array() )
5013      {
5014          // Make sure we are not missing any param:
5015          $params = array_merge( array(
5016                  'text' => T_( '%s different users found %s posted %s helpful replies.' ),
5017              ), $params );
5018  
5019          global $DB;
5020  
5021          $comments_SQL = new SQL( 'Get number of helpful votes on comments for this user' );
5022          $comments_SQL->SELECT( 'cmvt_user_ID AS user_ID, COUNT(*) AS cnt' );
5023          $comments_SQL->FROM( 'T_comments' );
5024          $comments_SQL->FROM_add( 'INNER JOIN T_comments__votes ON comment_ID = cmvt_cmt_ID' );
5025          $comments_SQL->WHERE( 'comment_author_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
5026          $comments_SQL->WHERE_and( 'comment_status IN ( "published", "community", "protected", "review" )' );
5027          $comments_SQL->WHERE_and( 'cmvt_helpful = 1' );
5028          $comments_SQL->GROUP_BY( 'user_ID' );
5029  
5030          $links_SQL = new SQL( 'Get number of helpful votes on links for this user' );
5031          $links_SQL->SELECT( 'lvot_user_ID AS user_ID, COUNT(*) AS cnt' );
5032          $links_SQL->FROM( 'T_links' );
5033          $links_SQL->FROM_add( 'INNER JOIN T_links__vote ON link_ID = lvot_link_ID' );
5034          $links_SQL->WHERE( 'link_creator_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
5035          $links_SQL->WHERE_and( 'lvot_like = 1' );
5036          $links_SQL->GROUP_BY( 'user_ID' );
5037  
5038          $votes = $DB->get_assoc( 'SELECT user_ID, SUM( cnt )
5039               FROM ('.$comments_SQL->get().' UNION ALL '.$links_SQL->get().') AS tbl
5040              GROUP BY user_ID' );
5041  
5042          // Calculate total votes from all users
5043          $users_count = count( $votes );
5044          $votes_count = 0;
5045          foreach( $votes as $user_votes )
5046          {
5047              $votes_count += $user_votes;
5048          }
5049  
5050          return sprintf( $params['text'], '<b>'.$users_count.'</b>', $this->login, '<b>'.$votes_count.'</b>' );
5051      }

5054      /**
5055       * Get number of spam votes which were made by this user
5056       *
5057       * @param array Params
5058       * @return string Result
5059       */
5060  	function get_reputation_spam( $params = array() )
5061      {
5062          // Make sure we are not missing any param:

5064                  'text' => T_( '%s successfully reported %s spams!' ),
5065              ), $params );
5066

5068

5072          $comments_SQL->WHERE( 'cmvt_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
5073          $comments_SQL->WHERE_and( 'cmvt_spam = 1' );
5074

5076          $links_SQL->SELECT( 'COUNT(*) AS cnt' );
5077          $links_SQL->FROM( 'T_links__vote' );
5078          $links_SQL->WHERE( 'lvot_user_ID = '.$this->ID );
5079          $links_SQL->WHERE_and( 'lvot_spam = 1' );
5080  
5081          $votes = $DB->get_var( 'SELECT SUM( cnt )
5082              FROM ('.$comments_SQL->get().' UNION ALL '.$links_SQL->get().') AS tbl' );
5083  
5084          return sprintf( $params['text'], $this->login, '<b>'.$votes.'</b>' );

5109      /**
5110       * Send an email notification when user account has been changed
5111       *
5112       * @param boolean true if the main profile picture was changed, false otherwise
5113       * @param mixed false if there was no new profile picture upload, the newly uploaded file ID otherwise
5114       */
5115  	function send_account_changed_notification( $avatar_changed = false, $new_avatar_upload = false )
5116      {
5117          if( empty( $this->significant_changed_values ) && ( ! $avatar_changed ) && ( ! $new_avatar_upload ) )
5118          { // Nothing important was changed, so no need to send changed notification
5119              return;
5120          }
5121  
5122          $email_template_params = array(
5123                  'user_ID' => $this->ID,
5124                  'login'   => $this->login,
5125                  'fields'  => array(
5126                      'login'     => array( 'title' => NT_('Login') ),
5127                      'group_ID'  => array( 'title' => NT_('Group'), 'className' => 'Group' ),
5128                      'nickname'  => array( 'title' => NT_('Nickname') ),
5129                      'firstname' => array( 'title' => NT_('First name') ),
5130                      'lastname'  => array( 'title' => NT_('Last name') ),
5131                      'gender'    => array( 'title' => NT_('Gender') ),
5132                      'ctry_ID'   => array( 'title' => NT_('Country'), 'className' => 'Country' ),
5133                      'rgn_ID'    => array( 'title' => NT_('Region'), 'className' => 'Region' ),
5134                      'subrg_ID'  => array( 'title' => NT_('Sub-region'), 'className' => 'Subregion' ),
5135                      'city_ID'   => array( 'title' => NT_('City'), 'className' => 'City' ),
5136                  ),
5137                  'avatar_changed'    => $avatar_changed,
5138                  'new_avatar_upload' => $new_avatar_upload,
5139              );
5140  
5141          foreach( $email_template_params['fields'] as $user_field_name => $user_field_data )
5142          { // Set new and previous values for email template
5143              $field_was_changed = ( isset( $this->significant_changed_values[ $user_field_name ] ) && ( ! empty( $this->significant_changed_values[ $user_field_name ] ) ) );
5144              if( isset( $user_field_data['className'] ) )
5145              { // The field value is an object ID, get the object name
5146                  $Cache = & call_user_func( 'get_'.$user_field_data['className'].'Cache' );
5147                  $Object = & $Cache->get_by_ID( $this->get( $user_field_name ), false, false );
5148                  $user_field_data['new'] = empty( $Object ) ? NULL : $Object->get_name();
5149                  if( $field_was_changed )
5150                  { // Get the old display value of the field
5151                      $Object = & $Cache->get_by_ID( $this->significant_changed_values[ $user_field_name ] );
5152                      $user_field_data['old'] = $Object->get_name();
5153                  }
5154              }
5155              elseif( $user_field_name == 'gender' )
5156              { // This is the gender field, get the display name of the gender
5157                  $user_field_data['new'] = $this->get_gender();
5158                  if( $field_was_changed )
5159                  {
5160                      $user_field_data['old'] = ( $this->significant_changed_values[ $user_field_name ] == 'M' ) ? T_('A man') : T_('A woman');
5161                  }
5162              }
5163              else
5164              { // Get the field value
5165                  $user_field_data['new'] = $this->get( $user_field_name );
5166                  if( $field_was_changed )
5167                  { // The field was changed
5168                      $user_field_data['old'] = $this->significant_changed_values[ $user_field_name ];
5169                  }
5170              }
5171  
5172              if( !isset( $user_field_data['old'] ) )
5173              { // The field was not changed or the old value was empty
5174                  $user_field_data['old'] = array_key_exists( $user_field_name, $this->significant_changed_values ) ? NULL : $user_field_data['new'];
5175              }
5176  
5177              $email_template_params['fields'][ $user_field_name ] = $user_field_data;
5178          }
5179  
5180          send_admin_notification( NT_('User profile changed'), 'account_changed', $email_template_params );
5181          // Clear changed values
5182          $this->significant_changed_values = array();
5183      }
5184  }
5185  
5186  ?>
